name: Sure Instinct
description:
Sure Instinct is a skill based puzzle-game. Steer a ball through challenging maps to the goal of each stage.
By changing the perspective, you can reach objects on two different sides of each map. Avoid falling down into the abyss or to lose your health on dangerous objects. Collect items to reach new sections or to find hidden paths.

Can you find the way to the goal, beat the high score or find the fastest path through the stages?

name: Jester
description:
You are Jester, the King's fool. Your goal is to collect the Element items in the middle of each rooms in all of the dungeons. To do so, you need to collect a KEY in a room to open the lock that leads to an Element item. When you get a Sword you will be able to defeat the guards, if you kill all four of them, you will get a Bonus Item.

JESTER is based on an exclusive and obscure (also lost in time) Canadian game named Le Fou du Roi, or King’s Jester, one of the games available on the Vidéoway system in the 1990s

name: Sydney Hunter Collection
description: The Sydney Hunter Collection brings together four great titles from CollectorVision Games, each originally released for a different classic retro gaming platform. Includes Sydney Hunter and the Shrines of Peril, Sydney Hunter and the Sacred Tribe, Sydney Hunter and the Caverns of Death, and Jester.

name: Pokémon Tectonic
description: Explore the Makya region, where old and new collide. Host to dozens of ancient caves and tunnels, Makya was settled anew by the disbanded members of Team Chasm, who 20 years ago sought the power of the Regis. When a strange new group puts those plans back into motion, the people of Makya need a newcomer like yourself to delve deep and find the truth. Can you keep Makya from repeating its past?

name: HoleHole
description:
"HoleHole" is a relaxed adventure game where players freely explore a map, collect objects, and assist residents through conversations. The game features a visual novel-style storytelling experience and allows players to progress at their own pace.

One day, the player accidentally falls into a certain hole and freely explores the dungeon to find objects and search for residents. However, it is also a player's choice to not engage in exploration.

name: Mechanism
description: Late into the night, the bear animatronic awakes from the stench of suspicious activity.. what will he find?

name: Hole Digging Game
description: to dig a hole (or not dig a hole)

name: The Ultimate Death Clock
description: You find yourself in a singularity with Death itself. With few chances to speak with the living, Death proposes a little game. Do you dive deep within yourself to indulge this cosmic guide and find out when you will meet again on official business? The Ultimate Death Clock awaits!

name: Shadow Stalker
description: An Asymmetrical Horror FPS.

name: Unknown FPV: Drone Simulator
description: Unknown FPV: The ultimate FPV drone simulator. Master the art of flying in a vibrant, stylized world. Realistic physics, customizable settings, and multiplayer support. Beginners learn, experts escape. Join us on the journey to make FPV simulators great again.

name: Emberwood
description: Embark on a thrilling journey through the mystical realm of Viridar. Play as the agile Sentinel or the mighty Dragon Knight, both equipped with their own unique skills and abilities. Gain allies and develop your combat prowess while traversing the war-torn path of the Warrior-King.

name: Carved Out
description: Carved Out is an inn building and management game with classic cRPG inspired visuals. Carve your place to a mountain far from settlements, near to dungeons among adventurers to attract heroes travelling through the area! Rent out rooms, create amazing stone works, provide creative services.

name: Arctic 51
description: Astronaut's regular expedition turns into survival on a new planet: dig, solve physical puzzles, fight enemies, explore mysteries. Find out the reason for the disappearance of the population of an entire civilization and save the Earth.

name: Meow Master: Battle for Catnip
description: Hey there, fellow cat lovers! Get ready to become a Meow Master and fight for the ultimate prize: catnip! In this game, you'll have to use your cat-like skills to fight, run, and hide your way to the finish line, all while making sure you stay alive. Remember, you only have 9 lives!

name: Typing Bullets
description: Typing Bullets is an arcade typing roguelite game, where you learn new words, you practice your typing skills, all while fighting against enemies based off of keyboard keys. Upgrade and customize your character, and if you get overwhelmed by your foes, respawn instantly through the quiz mechanic.

name: Days of Doom
description: Gather your heroes and fight to make it to Sanctuary in this tactical RPG roguelite. Did we mention the zombies, raiders, and mysterious monstrosities that inhabit this post-apocalyptic wasteland? Welcome to the world of Days of Doom.

name: Puzzle Go!
description: Puzzle Go! is a casual jigsaw puzzle game. Players use the mouse to adjust the position of the tiles to restore the picture. As a player, this game provides multiple exquisite CGs as levels. At the same time, the game has carefully prepared a rich achievement system for players.

name: Magic Golf
description: Mini Golf like you never played before! Thousands of crazy courses are waiting for you. And once you're ready for something else, start creating your own and share them with the world! Don't forget to upgrade your character with tons of wacky accessories. And most importantly, have fun!

name: Jock Dummy: Ice Hockey Edition
description:
Who needs hockey sticks when you have a player with missing teeth willing to sacrifice his body to score?
In this unique arcade-style twist on ice hockey, play as a crash dummy who slingshots himself to put the puck in the net. Avoid obstacles standing in your way. 36 levels to master. Do you have what it takes to take home the cup?

name: Cog Hero
description:
A board full of Gears. Can you make them all turn?
Tap to select, then tap to move.
Stacked gears turn if either of the colors match their neighbor. Different colors can overlap and spin.
One-way gears can't be moved. Use others to connect and spin them.
Win to unlock more color schemes.
Random levels for infinite replays. No ads, play Easy as much as you want. Upgrade for higher difficulty levels!

name: Solitaire Family World
description: The card game Solitaire Family World takes you into a world of fairy tales. Experience fantastic quests. Achieve exclusive rewards in exciting solitaire games. Expand your park with every single chapter.

name: WingSuit Wiley 2.0
description:
Join Wiley in the battle against pollution. The object of the game is to fly as far as you can as fast as you can to escape the evil dark cloud Mr. Pollution. Along the way you can use various power ups such as telekinesis, shield, double coin, coin magnet and wings which give you the ability to ram obstacles. When you ram obstacles or proximity fly it builds your focus meter. Proximity flying is the art of dodging an obstacle at the very last moment. When you focus it slows down time.
Join us as we fly through the streets of French Quarters in NOLA!
Super smooth animation!
Wiley says speed is the name of the game with his super cool wing suit!
Focus to improve your proximity flying!
Use telekinesis to clear your path!
Your speed power up will let you ram anything!
Enjoy our wonderful stereo sound track!
Please use headphones for best sound!
Don't forget, watch out for that ice cream truck!

name: MXGP Motocross Rush
description:
Challenge and beat your opponents in the MXGP Motocross Rush championship, move your bubblehead in the most fun and exciting physics-based racing game.
MXGP Motocross Rush transforms you into a rider in the official MXGP motocross championship. Win every challenge to beat the official champions, will you be able to defeat the competition? Throw down the gas but cross the finish line with a supercool outfit, your look counts!

name: Manage the Stars: Sports Agent
description:
Become a head of a sport agency, hire agents, get football athletes, take care of them and sign them to best contracts you can find.
Negotiate to get the best terms and the biggest profit cut to form the most respected football agency in the US

name: Crash Cam
description: Welcome to Hollywood! You're the hottest director in town!! So take your camera & your rockin' tag-along actor (Mr. A-List Anthony) through crazy film sets using simple 1 touch controls.

name: Dolphin Paradise: Wild Friends
description: Here, you can feed, train and create a strong bond with realistic looking dolphins and orcas. These high-resolution, animated dolphins swim and perform tricks across your screen and crave your attention at each step of the game, awaiting your commands. Learn tricks and perform Shows! Share with friends!

name: Eagle Eye: Find the Difference
description: Eagle Eye is an engaging "spot it" game. Sharpen your observation skills by finding differences in stunning HD images. Play at your own pace or compete in the multiplayer mode. Enjoy the challenge and stay engaged for hours.

name: Ships at Sea
description: Experience the thrill of navigating a wide range of ships. Immerse yourself in various career paths such as service, cargo and commercial fishing, as you explore the breathtaking open world of Norway´s Lofoten Islands with its stunning scenery. The ocean is within your reach!

name: Jorogumo
description: Embark on a perilous journey through the haunting depths of the forest in Jorogumo, a gripping stealth and puzzle game. When your brother vanishes in the eerie woods, you must summon your courage and venture into the heart of darkness to unravel the enigma surrounding the ancient legend of Jorogumo.

name: Vitam Finire
description: A Horror Game made by Nobody, we could add more words, but this description needs to be short. Bye Have a great day

name: Dolos
description: In this narrative management game, you will have to decide about the future of everyone according to the anticipations of an AI. Help create the efficient society of tomorrow or preserve the dreams and hopes of everybody. Your choices will affect the future of Gauetia.

name: ItsJustAStory
description: ItsJustAStory is a solo post-apocalyptic game, it's a story about a doctor and a build-up to the production of the actual game. your goal is to stay alive and find the cure, you play through a series of events with tasks simple to complete. the main focus here is to get the story.

name: Reflector Rhythm Master
description: A hybrid of a block breaker and a music game. A strange and fun mechanic where all of the stages fit on one screen. And the antithesis of the easy-to-see music game.

name: Kid Bubblegum
description: Aliens have invaded, and Kid Bubblegum is too cool to let that slide. Armed with his trusty Gumslinger, he’ll kick some alien butt and shoot bubblegum…and he has plenty of gum!

name: Carnival in the Hut
description: There are ingredients on the level that you have to drag into the pot. Drag into the pot: eggs, oil, water in a bucket, flour in a bag, and dough.

name: Doggy Don't Care
description: Unleash adorable chaos as a mischievous pup! Explore, collect, and smash your way around the house & beyond in this cheeky adventure. Fetch the approval of your feathered friend, Rocko the Parrot, by digging into a list of fun-filled tasks. It's sure to be a pawsitively unforgettable day!

name: Undivine Comedy: Hank's Inferno
description: A comedy roguelite set in 7 circles of hell. Hack, slash, upgrade and insult your way through numerous enemies. Square off against challenging bosses. Explore hidden paths and find valuable booty. After this you'll never look at hell the same way again.

name: Biohazard Village: Cloud Z Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Biohazard RE:3 - Cloud Z Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Chickenauts
description: Chicken Strike is a fast paced, action roguelike game where you fight Alien Chickens that are invading your farm. All of the combat happens in huge Spaceship where you try to clear rooms full of various alien chickens that are trying you to stop from going to the main floor.

name: Boxed Tower: Actual Tower Defense
description: Defend your tower against waves of enemies. Survive the horde.

name: Dropsol
description: Dropsol is a retro-style arcade game where, equipped only with a parasol that reduces your speed, you have to dodge obstacles and take special items to increase your chances of getting a big score.

name: Witchcraft Survivors
description: Annihilate hordes of enemies in this thrilling, fast-paced action roguelite rpg and fill the screen with your magic. Kill your foes, become stronger each second and upgrade your characters with new spells and abilities. Can you survive the monsters that threaten your very existence?

name: Glitter Justice
description: Armed with heart blasters and glitter grenades, fight in this girly pop FPS adventure to defeat robots with love and sparkles. Team up in co-op mode to spread love and chaos together!

name: Samurai VR
description: Grab a Katana and stand on your daimyo's castle defense, alone against an infinite horde of enemy shinobis. Kill the enemies, hit back shurikens, dodge bombs and beware of enemy Samurais!

name: Spellborn
description: In this open-world medieval RPG, use your magic and acrobatic abilities to combat the monarchy and bring freedom back to the people.

name: Cube Control
description: Help a lone cube navigate through sixty electrifying levels in this isometric puzzle-adventure game. Carefully manage the use of your limited moves in order to complete each level successfully, all while avoiding dangerous obstacles through careful timing and creative movement choices.

name: Tunguska: Dead Zone
description: The Dead Zone DLC brings players back to Tunguska Exclusion Zone for two additional playthroughs, each being a New Game+ mode with new challenges, new weapons, and new experience. Are you ready to return to the action?

name: Old Boy
description: Old Boy, your coffee is ready! Old Boy? Old Boy is sleeping, and at this moment he's dreaming that he's a young boy with incredible skills of being young! Yes, a young boy in full vigor, and believe it or not, he knows how to run and jump, and he even does it with some mastery.

name: Dread Descent
description: A precision platformer where you have been tasked with infiltrating an ancient spacecraft buried deep beneath the surface of an alien planet. To reach the vessel, you will need to dodge traps, risk harrowing jumps, and descend into a deadly world.

name: Stellar Serenity
description: Stellar Serenity is a relaxation game where you process materials and craft items in a spaceship. No pressure, no chance to fail.

name: Breezy
description: It's like golf, but you control the wind. Harness the breeze to platform through a variety of colorful and wacky courses. Collect Golden Tees to unlock new courses and characters. Conquer holes with random modifiers in Remix Rush.

name: Catcha Snatcha
description: In this VIC-20 game from 1983, busy store detective Barney Bootlace must appease the shop manager by running around the shop floor dealing with various problems, from dealing with lost property and children, to apprehending shoplifters and even dealing with planted bombs!

name: Crownless Abyss
description: Crownless Abyss is a fantasy turn-based rogue-lite dungeon crawler about exploring the treacherous depths of the ocean in a search for a divine relic to restore the world.

name: Dead Detective: Zombie Conspiracy
description: Take on the role of Margh, undead private detective, in this humorous and wacky graphic adventure that combines point-and-click mechanics with an elaborate “deaduction” system. Use your brain (or what's left of it) and solve bizarre and unconventional mysteries in a world ruled by zombies.

name: Operation Space Force
description: Join Operation Space Force, a free-to-play team-based shooter that takes place in space. Explore weapon customization and different heroes, explore your base, fight against enemies, and experience different game modes.

name: Neon D-Fence Remaster
description: An AI menace is headed to your motherboard! Can you survive?

name: Mark of the Deep
description: Mark of the Deep is an epic pirate-themed adventure with strong narrative and a thrilling mix of Metroidvania and Souls-Like elements. Embark on this journey as the fierce Marcus "Rookie" Ramsey and explore the mysteries of a cursed island to find your missing pirate crew.

name: Escape From Crimson Manor: Trapped Together
description: "Escape From Crimson Manor - Trapped Together" is a co-op Escape the room puzzle adventure set in a Victorian manor, where you and a partner must work together to solve challenging puzzles and evade the relentless pursuit of the mansion's sinister owner, Can you uncover the dark secrets and escape?

name: HeroSquare
description: Armed with your ability to parry & reflect enemy bullets, you must explore a colourful metroidvania world that looks like a 1980s arcade game. Return to the Golden Age of gaming, as you fight enemies, face formidable bosses and discover new powers!

name: DHL Box Stacker Pro
description: Beat the best in DHL Box Stacker Pro. Stack boxes as fast as possible to rise above the competition. This single player VR experience features intense gameplay. How high can you try?

name: Parkasaurus: Prehistoric Wonders
description:
10 New Animals
American Lion, Mammoth, Sabertooth, Megatherium, Eastern Puma ,Giant Capybara, Short Faced Bear, Dodo, Dire Wolf, Dwarf Pronghorn

name: Myth
description: Myth is a puzzle horror multiplayer game that guarantees an intense and headache-inducing experience with friends. Why the headache, you ask? Well, let's just say the puzzles are so mind-bendingly hard, they should come with a complimentary bottle of aspirin!

name: Neonscape
description: Embrace Onyx, the master of the Black Lotus, in intense first-person hack n' slash combat. Maneuver compact battlegrounds, unleash spatial manipulation, and showcase unmatched agility. How long can you survive the relentless waves? Brace for an adrenaline-pumping test of mettle!

name: Whispers of the Luminaries
description:
Whispers of the Luminaries is an idol-themed murder mystery visual novel where you balance social life with detective work.

Investigate, obtain clues and deduce the killer.

name: Radix Chronicle
description: Radix is a tactical RPG inspired by SNES and early Playstation classics. With dark themes but bright characters, this fantasy tale changes depending on how you fight! Your magic can even alter the land itself. Use your timing and skill, rather than your luck, to lead your party home safely each day!

name: Homestar Runner: Halloween Hide n' Seek
description: A short Halloween-themed point n' click game featuring the dumb animal characters of Homestar Runner dot com.

name: Heaven's Paws
description: Do all dogs go to Heaven? You have to figure it out! Get through this emotionally adventurous story about a boy and his little friend, Max.

name: Jetpack Battle
description: Vertical FPS. Skiing, Jetpacks, and speed!

name: Dungeon of Destiny
description: Dungeon of Destiny is a roguelike where instead of loot you get to choose personality traits for your hero. Combine them into classes and more. Shape your behavior, looks and fighting style. Face consequences and find your destiny!

name: SpeedOverflow
description: Who is not obsessed with the passion and pleasure brought by speed? Never Stop, NEVER STOP!! LET SPEED OVERFLOOOOOOOOOOW!!!

name: Makoto Wakaido's Case Files: Trilogy Deluxe
description: A game based on a simple concept: a mystery puzzle you can complete in an hour. Can you solve the cases narrated in this beautiful pixel-art adventure?

name: Caislean: Paranormal
description: A dynamic survival-horror game featuring gadget setup and point-and-click sequences. Investigate the castle during the day and place cameras, sensors, and snares throughout the explored environment. Locate paranormal hotspots and read clues about countering enemies.

name: Wish Us Luck
description: Wish Us Luck is a multi-plot interactive fiction fueled by your hard decisions. Play three strangers whose fates are intertwined by the cogs of chance on an eventful day. But remember: favoring one character means jeopardizing the others.

name: Hotel Boom!
description: Welcome to Hotel Boom! A game about hotel management, where you have to make sure that your guests are happy and well fed. Manage your hotel, prepare delicious meals and provide top-notch guest service.

name: The Rings of Powder
description: "The Rings of Powder" is a fun and ironizing game combining exploration with the construction of an underground kingdom and elements of real -time strategy and idle. The project is an irony of both some legendary and less legendary movies and scenes from reality.

name: Skystrider
description: Embark on an epic journey in "Skystrider," a 3D action platformer. As a resurrected hero, explore a ruined world, navigating perilous paths amidst clouds and tides. Unleash ancient technology, unravel secrets, and shape your destiny in this captivating adventure.

name: Battle of Zama
description: Battle of Zama is a video game about one of the most important battles in history. Scipio from Rome’s Army met Hannibal’s Army on the battlefield in Carthage. Battle of Zama is inspired by old Avalon Hill and SPI games.

name: theHunter: Call of the Wild - Emerald Coast Australia
description: Welcome to Australia! Discover breathtaking landscapes and hunt iconic animal species such as the Saltwater Crocodile and Eastern Gray Kangaroo as you explore this magical new hunting destination down under.

name: Apocalypse Run!
description: Escape from Motorlord Dysentery and reverse the Apocalypse while learning about American history.

name: Painted Peril
description: Take up the paintbrush and unleash the power of color with Sylvia the painter mage squirrel. Mix pigments, cast paint spells, and battle living rocks in a vibrant world of magic and adventure.

name: Leap of Legends
description: Leap of Legends is an epic 2D platformer game where players compete as their favorite animal characters in thrilling PvP and PvE battles. Easy to learn, yet hard to master!

name: Fall of the Stick Knights
description: Fall of the Stick Knights is based on physics-controlled characters to player with friends up to 4 people. The game features has skin customization, nice fun hook mechanic and the clumsy characters, providing a lot of fun. Beware of the rain of crates.

name: Starcade Factions
description: Starcade Factions is a turn-based strategy game where space commanders battle ships in short action-packed games.

name: Ilya Muromec i Solovey-Razboynik
description: Ilya Muromec i Solovey-Razboynik is a computer game in the "quest" genre. The game was developed by PIPE studio and published by 1C.

name: Small Town Emo
description:
Small Town Emo is a gay GameBoy walking-simulator. Follow the story of Ken, a 17 year old with an awkward crush on his best friend Fergus.

Talk to characters, solve simple puzzles, make (occasional) dialogue choices, and explore! Navigate through the complexities of a teenage crush, and let the story of this small town emo kid unfold around you.

name: Sabaku no Kuni no bouken-ki: Aru to Chitei no Meikyuu
description: A simple and nostalgic side-scrolling action game with rough dots and 3 chords.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S: Yajilin
description: Draw a loop and paint cells black in this double-challenging original puzzle from Nikoli!

name: NoEvidence: Scary Horror Quest Survival Story
description: Ready to solve the case? Play No Evidence, the thrilling detective adventure!

name: Classic Pool and Cyber Pool Bundle
description: This bundle offers a thrilling and immersive pool experience, allowing players to test their skills and enjoy the best of both worlds.

name: Omen Fall
description: Omen Fall is an action platform game with challenging battles set in the fantastic and vast lands of three different realms. Resurrect from the Balbal with Neu, where death is forbidden, and fight to destroy the chaos. Improve Neu throughout your journey and learn his dramatic story.

name: Hawaii Detective: Killing of a Krypto King
description: "Hawaii Detective: Killing of a Krypto King" is a Detective Mystery Visual Novel and Yuri Dating Sim where you play as Detective Laura Ko as she interrogates suspects, investigates clues and follows leads to solve this tropical tale. Maybe she even finds the woman of her dreams along the way too!

name: InfiniPicross 3
description: InfiniPicross 3: The Conclusion of the InfiniPicross series! Faster and more complex procedural puzzles (as well as better looking), even more puzzles (IP 2.0 puzzles packed in), a smooth interface built on previous improvements, easy to tweak themes and a very easy built-in puzzle editor.

name: PowerSimulator
description: Do you want to be a upright official or corrupt officials？Choose your choice,Reaching the pinnacle of power.

name: Where is Mr. Cloud
description: Hello. My name is Toprak, i lost my plush cat, can you help me find it?

name: Town of Dusk
description: Players will enter the Town of Dusk, built on the eve of Empire of Japan's defeat in World War II, along with other characters. Avoid being killed by other characters! Find the mastermind behind the scenes, unravel all the conspiracies, and uncover the 'true' truth! Also Escape the Town of Dusk!

name: Realm Craft
description: Craft equipment, Recruit heroes, , and Explore dangerous lands. Command and defend your castle in this immersive 2D strategy game. Face challenging waves of enemies as you shape the fate of your kingdom. Unleash your strategic prowess and forge your legacy in this epic fantasy adventure.

name: The Last Stand at Camp Zombie
description: Face hungry zombies, solve complex puzzles, and explore the hidden secrets of the campsite while working together with a friend in local multiplayer. The tension is high and every bullet counts - will you be able to survive until the end?

name: Puzzle Adventures
description: A choose your own adventure game where the player is tasked with finding out how they ended up in the small house on the beach. To answer this mystery the player must solve puzzles and make choices to explore the story.

name: Calcium Contract
description: Calcium Contract is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you're on a mission to finish a contract that got out of hand. Learn to swiftly move around your enemies and master your arsenal as you fight your way toward the grand finale.

name: Dead Shapes
description: Dead Shapes is an action rogue-lite. Fight, die, learn, and repeat as you journey through uniques levels. Be ready to discover thousands of character builds.

name: BattleGuild
description: Introducing BattleGuild, an action-packed top-down dungeon crawler set in a grimdark fantasy world. Join the ranks of an esteemed guild of Adventurers, undertaking dangerous quests to slay monstrous creatures and protect the realm. Forge your own path to glory.

name: Vamps-Imulator
description: Vamps-Imulator is an autobattle RPG that takes the ill-fated vampire player who must grow in strength and undo the curse to return to their once peaceful life. Upgrade your equipment, stats, skills, and trade for crafting recipes to undo the curse that has taken hold of your life.

name: MatchVentures
description: Engage in a match-3 quest under a mysterious castle! Overcome puzzles, confront dungeon dwellers, and restore grand castles. Unveil secret pathways, gather treasures, and rebuild a kingdom in this captivating MatchVentures game!

name: Air Fury
description: Air Fury is a 2D racing game where you have to fly through multiple checkpoints on a fixed route within fixed period of time. Show a master class, squeezing the maximum out of the next prototype to see its maximum capabilities threading the needle!

name: Orderly Havoc
description: Orderly Havoc is a time management game where you must do chores. Each chore has a unique minigame requiring timing or solving. Do this before you stress out or else you'll have a panic attack.

name: Dragot
description: Dragot is a fast paced bullet hell dungeon crawler in which you live or die by the mysterious items you find hidden in each room; Fizzle out early or snowball your newly acquired powers to fight through all six areas and finally defeat the dragon that pursues you.

name: Heretic’s Fork: Probation
description: Dear candidate, start your free probation period as manager of Hell! Punish sinners by using our deck-building system, constructing fiendish towers to manage underworld hordes. Good luck!

name: Final Nation
description: In this challenging action-adventure you are on a quest to find a mystic crystal to save your country from an evil militant cult. Explore vast lands and secret chambers invested with dangerous enemies. In order to succeed you must escape hazards, collect crucial items, and destroy key targets.

name: Saikyo Robots
description: Saikyo Robots is a roguelike RTS, inspired by pikmin and vampire survivor. Explore during the day and command your robot army to gather resources, produce, repair and fight. At night, hordes of enemies will attack your base. Upgrade your army and base to survive and obliterate the enemy onslaught.

name: Dicelike
description: Roll the dice, collect loot and grow stronger! Buy powerful items from the gold you earned from slaying monster and create unique equipment combination.

name: Sandbox
description: The goal of the game is to collect 22 bills. To collect them, you need to press the "play" button and move to the sandbox level.

name: Ananse and the Pot of Wisdom
description: Embark on a magical journey inside the first story ever told. Do you have what it takes to obtain the Pot of Wisdom from the Sky God?

name: Bîme
description: Embark on an oceanic adventure unlike any other. Enter a world of mystery and intrigue, where danger lurks around every corner and secrets are waiting to be uncovered. Will you discover the hidden depths of Bîme?

name: Waking Atlas
description: Wake the great titan Atlas before he drops the world in this colorful and weird JRPG!

name: B.O.W II VR
description: In this, the exciting sequel to 'Bodies of Water VR', you will learn to cull lionfish, explore underwater cave systems, deep dive using tri-mix, as well as visit the artic circle, and more!!

name: Breach
description: Challenge your friends or other players in the world in a dynamic duel based on melee weapons. Demonstrate liveliness and strategy to defeat your opponent. Impose your style of play and show others that you are the best.

name: Predatory Islands
description: Predatory Islands is a real-time multiplayer online game. Start with just an island, develop technologies, build, extract resources and create weapons to attack other players. Different game scenarios set different goals for the players, victory is determined by their achievement.

name: Balatro
description: Balatro is a deck-building roguelite where you must play poker hands and earn chips to defeat enemy blinds. Enhance your deck of playing cards, buy Jokers to modify each hand you play, and discover new and wild synergies to win!

name: Gobbo Goes Adventures
description: Gobbo Goes Adventures is a isometric puzzle game with post industrial comic style.

name: Illwind
description: A top-down steampunk coop romp where you embark on short action-packed adventures on an airship of your choice. Facing off against numerous enemies on your way to fame and fortune!

name: Hero's Quest: Lost Memories
description: A retro inspired JRPG Your choices during your quest will determine how the end of the game goes Mix and match your classes and sub-classes to unlock prestigious classes, a crafting system that allows you to build a multitude of weapons, armor, and items.

name: Mortal Fighter
description: Mortal Fighter: Choose from 15 unique fighters, battle in 2 dynamic environments, and engage in 15 gripping encounters in Story Mode. Test your skills in Player vs. Player, Local Co-op, or Online Multiplayer. Train in Training Mode and unleash your inner warrior in this intense fighting game.

name: Great Toy Showdown
description: Welcome to the Great Toy Showdown!! A casual shooter 8-player battle royale game where a variety of animal toy friends battle to be the only one left standing and win the love of their lives. Take on outcast and fallen toys and other animal toys to become the only surviving toy!

name: Donuts Runner
description: Donuts Runner is a 3D runner with a third-person view in which you have to control a cute fat cop. Run as far as possible while collecting as many donuts as possible. Beat your own records on the path to excellence and prove to everyone that you are the most fun cop in the area

name: Neko's Rage
description: 2D pixelart action game with many roguelite mechanics and power up. The gameplay is speed and hardcore but very addictive. You play as Nikki a female cyborg in an apocalyptic world rules by mechanicals creatures.

name: April '86
description: April ‘86 - is a mystical first-person thriller which has our protagonist journeying to the abandoned city of Pripyat, to confront the secrets of the past.

name: Future Theater
description: This is a game of watching the show. Players can watch the performances of various stages in the scene, and each stage has a different experience. In the scene, players can pick up the drumsticks on the drum stand in front of them and hit the drums in the scene with the rhythm of the music

name: Dark Hours
description: Dark Hours is a co-op survival horror game for 1-4 players. Your heist has been disrupted by a supernatural event, and your team of robbers is now trapped with an evil entity. Forget your plan, your mission is to survive. Explore and cooperate to find a way out or hide and pray for daylight.

name: City Legends: The Ghost of Misty Hill - Collector's Edition
description: The most gruesome incidents often occur in medical institutions, the doors of which hide terrible secrets and unexplained incidents. Can you handle the darkest secrets of Misty Hill?

name: Power Solenoid
description: Meet Rockhound, multidimensional traveler living inside Grand Palace, a place filled with strange creatures called Goblins! Discover their personalities and requests!

name: Real-Time General
description: Take command and join 400 players in a massive WW2 strategy game lasting TWO-MONTHS in real-time. Queue up commands and watch them play out over the day. Collaborate, strategize and relive D-Day like never before.

name: Barkelona
description: An immersion-style game for Spanish learners

name: Ciudad Alfombra
description: In this game, you must dodge the obstacles in the city and complete the missions available. There is a wide variety of vehicles and colors, such as minivans and large buses.

name: Bloba's Adventure
description: The game will immerse you in an incredibly exciting story, the main character of which is a very good-natured character named Bloba. One day, walking with his pet Kaklya, Bloba made a decision, the consequences of which turned out to be completely unpredictable, based on this, our adventure begins.

name: Roll the Dark Heart
description: A creepy and dangerous world, no matter where your feet lead you, only fog awaits ahead, which seemingly mercilessly mocks the troubles of the still living and already dead creatures of this world, among which man is far from being at the top of the food chain.

name: Yggdrasill
description: "Yggdrasill" is a click idle game, you can plant the seed of the last world tree entrusted to you by the goddess, and synthesize stars to save the decayed world.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Cthulhu Mythos 2
description: Feel the cold breath of Cthulhu! Explore the worlds of Lovecraft, collect all the special cards!

name: Code Zodiac
description: Fight for the future in this story-driven, fast-paced robot boss rush. Code Zodiac is a compact, single-player action game with a compelling sci-fi narrative. Slash, shoot, and dodge your way through robotic titans as you fight to save the world.

name: Supracore
description: Supracore is a roguelike base building game. Build your base, upgrade it and defend against ongoing waves of enemies to gather more resource and expand your Core!

name: PISTA Motorsport
description: Get behind the wheel! With realistic graphics and physics, a wide selection of Argentine racing cars, and various game modes, it provides an authentic and thrilling racing experience for enthusiasts.

name: MiniBong
description: "MiniBong" is a lightweight rogue-like game that focuses on dress-up DIY and idle gameplay, while incorporating elements of combat, character development, and strategy.. You can feel the charm of dressing up and fighting at the same time.

name: Sqwrk
description: fast paced 3d platformer with momentum based movement

name: Astrosmash
description: Astrosmash was originally a Shoot´em up game for the Intellivision console in 1981. This reimagined version is based on the game’s original theme and gameplay but much more exciting and challenging. The new graphics are phenomenal and the amazing background music adds a lot of excitement.

name: Rising Snake: The Present World
description: Rising Snake: The Present World is a semi sandbox horror decryption adventure game. A fictional university campus based on real size. A "Taoist" with special abilities. A twisted and bizarre story. Waiting for your arrival.

name: Star Rangers
description: Star Rangers is an isometric spaceship RPG. You have to survive on the space station, explore abandoned sectors and anomalies, develop technologies and modify your ships.

name: Starlights
description: Starlights is a visual novel focusing on the character Fletcher. It tells a story of a protagonist who had to move schools because of an unforeseen circumstance. At the new school, he meets Fletcher, his roommate, and the story between Fletcher and the protagonist begins.

name: Transfusion
description: A VR game where you slice alien enemies into tiny pieces!

name: Retrosurge
description: Fight in an action packed fast paced roguelike bullet-hell. You control the waves, go as fast as you want or slow it down to your preference. You are in control of this arena, but can you survive the surge?

name: TAG: Tower Attack Game
description: Tower defense, but you're not defending this time! Place your paths, destroy towers, upgrade your ships and repeat. How far can you get in this retro-futuristic combat simulation?

name: Pilo and the Holobook
description: Join Pilo and Prof on a new space adventure! Use your Holobook to turn everything into stickers and create your encyclopedia of a new world. Explore new beautiful planets and meet new friends in this sweet adventure game.

name: Ascend
description: Ascend is an adventure puzzle game where a young woman must navigate to the top of a mystical mountain learning the secrets of both the past and the future to find the balance in all aspects of life.

name: Bumper Tanks
description: Take control of a tank and dash into the fight in this couch multiplayer, fast-paced, twin-stick shooter game! Collect various power-ups to hook around the destructible environment and blast your friends with whatever it takes. Remember: One shot, One kill!

name: The Four Paths
description: The Four Paths is a game with a multilinear story and strategic battles where you will have new cards according to the paths you choose. Play as Roy and sacrifice everything in exchange for money. Play as William and atone for your sins with a brutal revenge.

name: Late Night Drive
description: Explore various maps with your friends or play solo and relax. Whether you prefer a relaxing drive or a fast-paced, action-packed race, the choice is yours. Get ready to unforgettable journey through the city streets under the moonlit sky!

name: Sir. Ball-Up
description: Unrightfully imprisoned by his father, Sir. Ball-Up ventures up to confront his father and retake the throne which is rightfully his. A hardcore aimed adventure, join Sir. Ball-Up in his quest for repentance.

name: Apocalypse Blitz
description: Apocalypse Blitz is a unique 2D Beatem Up set in the not too distant future. Choose from a special team made up of two angels, an angry prophet, a so called super hero and a spiritual world astronaut ready to fight and free our altered homes from evil.

name: Haphazard Angel
description: In this co-op online multiplayer game, each player controls one of the Angel's wings. Work together to pick up orbs, but be careful not to let one wing become too strong! Communication is key in this funny and cute game.

name: Once Upon a Slime
description: Once Upon a Slime is the first game that I am making in my career of a game developer and is an arenashooter / Bossbeater game about a little slime. Weapons are in some modes upgradable and there will be a leaderboard on which you can compare your scores to the top 100 players!

name: Reincarnated in a Stone in a Different World, I want to Protect the Girl, so I will be Strong
description: The main character wakes up one day in another world, reincarnated as a stone. There, he meets a magician named Anna, the Queen of Femt Kingdom. He then joins her on her quest...

name: Under Supernova
description: An instant strategy science fiction simulation survival sandbox game. Players can control individuals, teams, and manage multiple bases. Players can farm, build, excavate, fight, produce, graze, explore, trade, record and pass on knowledge, and can also fly a spaceship to explore the starry sky.

name: Coda
description: ///CODA is an avant-garde exploration game with four diverse RPG-like chapters that each tell unique stories connected by a dynamic museum-esque overworld. Take a peak through the looking glass and wander...

name: Celente Immortal
description: An Action-RPG game where you can recruit characters from all over the world as you go on adventures and explore new areas.

name: Sky Runners Infinite: Parkour
description: "Sky Runners Infinite: Parkour" is the ultimate cyberpunk endless runner game that will leave you breathless!. Parkour, slide, jump, and dodge obstacles while collecting coins to buy new clothes, weapons, and upgrades.

name: The Feudal
description: It is a card game in the medieval setting, where you play a role of a feudal, manage your settlement, protect it and help the peasants resolve their problems.

name: Their Land
description: Their Land is an action-adventure first-person game with puzzles and an exciting story to experience. You play Jeremy, a 19 year old orphan who explores an untrodden island with his much older and more experienced friends. Will you fall victim to this fabled lands many perils?

name: Move My Moc
description: Import and play your LDraw models in an open-world, car-focused sandbox environment.

name: Angola '86
description: The first strategy game to capture the essence of the entire South African Border war, from Omugulugwombashe to UNTAG (Aug'66 - Mar'90)

name: Himiko's Quest
description: Himiko´s Quest is an adventure and Deckbuilding game that takes you across islands in the search of your sister. Along the way you will meet all kinds of characters and help them connect with there long lost friends or deliver packages to the next village.

name: Red Moon
description: The world is thrown into chaos when the moon suddenly turns red, causing its residents to turn into zombies.

name: Enchantment Secret Hideaway
description: Enchantment: Secret Hideaway is a magical hidden object game set in Thicket Wood, featuring various modes and puzzles to locate hidden fragments of magical objects and provide hours of fun and entertainment.

name: PathBlasters
description: Run, blast, and solve your way to victory! Experience the rush of a colorful, fast-paced chase, solo or against a friend! Burst through the levels and up your score in this retro-inspired arcade setting.

name: Succubus Prison
description: You've been dragged into robbing a house by a couple of thugs, but what you discover there is beyond anything you could have imagined.

name: Dr. Carlos' Personality Exam
description: It's a nice sunny day in Dubai, and you decide to wander into the shady clinic of Dr. Carlos PhD. Once inside, you are tasked with answering questions that will reveal your true nature...

name: Destruct Blocks
description: Destruct Blocks is an addictive isometric puzzle game that combines strategic thinking, block destruction, and color matching challenges. Navigate a shape composed of colored blocks through intricate levels, strategically demolishing target blocks while avoiding others.

name: Battle For Cosmos
description: Battle For Cosmos is a fast-paced, action-packed RTS set in space. With a focus on the battle it is perfect for those who want a thrilling and engaging strategy game without the unnecessary filler. Take control of your empire, build your defenses, and conquer the cosmos!

name: Impeachment Survivors
description: Survive the Impeachment! Impeachment Survivors is a political parody action roguelike with many waves of enemies, upgrades, and comedy. Be hypocrite, be corrupt, be a politician!

name: Biplane Baron 2: Flying Ace
description: How does it feel to be a biplane fighter pilot on Worl War I. Try to survive the onslaught, stay focus and embrace yourself to conquer the enemy in order to earn badges of appreciation and admiration from your colleagues. Why don't you try?

name: Horla
description: Horla is a 3D first-person horror game with puzzles and interactive storytelling. Play as Moacir Gonçalo, a private detective that is hired to investigate an old mysterious haunted house.

name: 808cc
description: Are you ready to take on the ultimate challenge in the world of extreme sports? Look no further than 808cc, where street racing and demolition derby are child's play compared to the battle drift arena. It is not just about driving skills - you will need to have a keen eye and a steady aim to survive

name: Ridiculous Rush
description: Ridiculous Rush - 2D platformer game with a big variety of levels. You control a character trying to find the way to a portal to the next level avoiding multiple obstacles. Each level has increasing level of difficulty. Some levels have multiple ways of completing. Try your best and find them all!

name: Dirty Room: Chapter 5
description: After knowing Dr. Q's whereabout, you rushed to an unknown graveyard...

name: Delphine Software Collection 1
description: Enjoy three stunning Amiga classics and a console gaming legend from the cinematic masters of home computer games, Delphine Software. Travel through time in Future Wars, unravel an international mystery in Operation Stealth, make first contact with an alien race in Another World and recover your identity in Flashback!

name: Sunsoft Collection 1
description: Sunsoft Collection 1 brings together six classic games from the renowned Japanese developer. Includes Mr. Gimmick, Blaster Master, Blaster Master Boy, Aero the Acro-Bat, Journey to Silius and Arabian.

name: Bonobros
description: Bonobros is a simultaneous turn based strategy game when you play with your favorite streamers as pawns.

name: Spacer Rescue: To Valhalla
description: In a universe full of opportunity and fortune as a Spacer two things are true: Space is really dangerous and big and two always remember to get paid. Pay your debts and stay safe!

name: Monterona
description: Build and decorate cute little streets from your Italian grandma's stories. Colorful houses, inventive decorations, and little citizens are waiting for you! Share your creations and explore how others build the same stories. No score, no pressure.

name: Fruit 66
description: Fruit 66 is a fresh new blend of cooking-and-driving chaos! Take on bite-sized, thrilling levels in this wacky and charming campaign as you concoct and deliver beverages while swerving through traffic at breakneck speeds!

name: The Dead are Not Dead
description: Five years after the world is devastated by a zombie virus, Alfred is looking for Jake, his older brother. Facing a post-apocalyptic scenario and many flesh-thirsty zombies.

name: Dungeons & Dropped Things
description: Ever wondered what happens to all that loot that is left behind when heroes are fighting their way through the dungeons? Well, worry no more, because, in Dungeons & Dropped Things, it is your job to reconnect lost loot with confused, annoying, and loot-hungry players.

name: SWAT Commander: Prologue
description:
The FREE PROLOGUE version of our tactical squad shooter. In SWAT Commander you take charge of an elite special forces unit. Issue orders to your SWAT team, manage its members and their equipment, but most importantly – complete your mission successfully.

SWAT Commander: Prologue is the FREE prologue version of the upcoming team tactical shooter and does not reflect the final version of the game.

name: Slothtopia
description: Slothtopia is a family-friendly charming life simulator game where you can fish, farm, build relationships, and even catch monsters as an adorable, hard working sloth. Explore the tropical island and its surrounding sea as you get lost in the adventure of Slothtopia!

name: Manager Can be Tough!: Case of the Kidnapped Waitress
description: Get back the waitress kidnapped by monsters! The manager of the restaurant takes up arms and stands up. A side-scrolling action game in which you fight using a variety of actions!

name: Watchmakers
description: In a small desert named Ozona, known for its magical properties and time-traveling abilities, a delivery person named Domino receives an assignment to deliver a watch from a mystical wanderer. Navigate through the world while facing obstacles to deliver a watch before it's too late.

name: Terra Toy
description: Cozy planet building toy

name: Pressure Washer
description: Pressure Washer is a VR cleaning simulation game. If you facing any stress, anxiety, tension, and worried, why not try it out? You just need to grab your pressure washer and get on with it. Your goal is very straightforward, wash out all the dirty little things from the surface.

name: Telluria: Forebodings
description: A 3D graphic adventure with parallel realities, ancient vestiges and dark omens. Play in two worlds and through two ages. Discover the past to shape the future. The fate of Telluria will rest on you.

name: High Times
description: In a world where you can get high with no consequences, the hardest drug to get over are your exes. In this (anti) dating sim, you'll manage a café, serve special donuts that get customers high, and live out the ultimate fantasy — getting closure with your exes!

name: RuneShroom
description: RuneShroom is a 2D action platformer where you play as Mushu. You must journey forth! Armed with an array of hand animated spell to drive the snails who have decimated the your people's lands, and who now endanger the very diety who gave you life.

name: Pyramid Curse
description: Explore the tunnels of a mysterious underground pyramid.

name: The Cake Adventure
description: The Cake Adventure is a two-player co-op game centered around split-controller mechanics, in which you'll face mazes, time trials, pirate ships and platforming section all to collect the three ingredients to bake your cake.

name: The Stranded Traveler
description: Embark on an epic journey in The Stranded Traveler, a 2D side-scrolling action-adventure game where you take on the role of a traveler stranded on a mysterious island. Explore dangerous environments, fight fierce enemies, and defeat challenging bosses!

name: Shield King
description: Fight off hordes of enemies, slay bosses, dash through enemies and push them off the buildings In this shield themed roguelite.

name: Project Teddy
description: Welcome to Project Teddy, the ultimate multiplayer game that promises endless fun and thrilling shootouts with your friends. Get ready to explore a game that was partially inspired by the popular games Garry’s Mod and Half-Life.

name: Square Inertia
description: Try to set the fastest times possible in Square Inertia: a fast-paced, momentum-based precision platformer. Race against the clock to improve your own personal best times and beat the author times set for each level.

name: LumiereMagna
description: 3D action fighting with 4 types of magic Defeat the monsters that await you in the ancient ruins Infinite game magic action game

name: Alien Protection
description: In this exciting game, you become a brave space traveler who finds himself on an alien planet after your spaceship breaks down.

name: Parcel Simulator
description: Inspect and dissect parcels and packages in this parcel inspection simulator! Examine labels for mistakes, contents for contraband and hone your parcel reviewing skills. Build, upgrade and expand your warehouse to take your parcel inspections to the next level!

name: Rap Attack!
description: Tour around the world and become a rap star in this fun 2D pixel-art platformer!

name: Faction Z
description: This is a medieval-themed zombie apocalypse world where we must be cautious not only of zombies but also of other survivors. We need to carefully search for resources, craft more powerful weapons and tools, and build fortified sanctuaries to defend against the zombies.

name: Slarcher
description: Slarcher is a thrilling VR game set in a cyberpunk world, where players can engage in intense parkour, archery, sword-fighting and take on a range of deadly robots. Get ready for heart-pumping action and adrenaline-fueled adventure!

name: Bee-Man
description: Our Bee-Man's hives are scattered all over the place. Help it collect all of the hives in each level and travel to the next level in the bubble!

name: Disasters Escape: The Island
description: "Manage resources, face natural disasters, and save citizens from the island in "Disasters Escape: The Island". Show your courage and leadership skills in this engaging single-player strategy game."

name: Abloom
description: Experience a vibrant flight and slide through a dead forest, solve mysteries, and bring life back to a world consumed by a black hole in this atmospheric puzzle game.

name: Rune Song
description: Rune Song is a 2D action / adventure platformer, where you'll help Baba explore a vast and whimsical world in search of the fabled Rune Song.

name: Hidden Kitten
description: Dive whisker-first into "Hidden Kitten," a purr-fectly delightful hidden object game! Follow Charly the cat's dream escapades, and search for hidden objects in charming black and white hand-drawn scenes. Prepare for a paw-sitively un-fur-gettable experience!

name: Launch Director
description: A walking simulator where you can launch rockets! Become the Launch Director for a commercial space transportation company. Can you configure these reusable rockets for a successful launch, ascent and landing?

name: I Hate (other) Animals!
description: I Hate (other) Animals! is a reverse bullet hell game with roguelite elements with focus on exciting loot in a survivors-like setting. Collect loot during each run and buy permanent upgrades to your characters to make the next run a bit easier.

name: Dicefolk
description: In this deck-building game, you play as a chimera summoner on an adventure to restore peace to your world! Explore unique biomes, recruit new chimeras, and build the perfect squad! Command your chimeras using unique dice mechanics to lead your squad to victory!

name: Third Defender
description: Third person shooter with elements of roguelite and tower defense. You must use your weapons, build traps and unlock active and passive skills to protect your dungeon from the undead.

name: Splatterpus
description: We made this entirely deterministic highscore arcade game and then added a virtual pet to it and if you feed the pet enough pancakes it explodes like the bunny in Wreck It Ralph and I just think that's a funny joke but I guess it's up to you to decide but honestly I think it's a pretty decent game.

name: Sapiens Craft
description: Begin as a small stone age tribe. End as a global super power in a future age. Craft and research your way through history!

name: Camping
description: Survive and RUN... Survive a massacre at the camp as you grab keys and logs to get out and increase the explorable area Can you Beat the game in the hardest difficulty and unlock 100% of all the achivements

name: Cyber Ninja that Climbs the City
description: You, the Ninja, have to climb up the skyscrapers of Cyber Tokyo using your grapple, while destroying the Tokyo cops with your Katana and Beam Gun! Play simple run of three stages aiming for the top of the Cyber Tower of Tokyo!

name: Margaret's Little Shop of Wonders
description: Gardening and magic are meeting in Margaret’s Little Shop of Wonders. Play as Margaret, a young witch who just opened her own flower shop, and fulfill the peculiar requests of her strange customers!

name: Shungite in Hand
description: You open your eyes, it's dark all around. Are you in an underground bunker, alone with your thoughts... or are you not alone there? Fear, apocalypse, darkness swallowed the world, most people are infected. You are at the epicenter... And can you change something?

name: LoYuno
description: You were kidnapped by a crazy girl. And your phone started predicting her future for a short time. It's up to you to find out who she is, why this day doesn't end, and how to get out of this house.

name: Tobi: Path of Truth
description: Tobi: Path of Truth is a stylized exploration adventure game in which you will embark on an epic journey to understand 7 deadly sins. As the protagonist, you will change the form to symbolic animals which represent each sin to traverse 7 various worlds.

name: Cat-aclysm
description: A 3D isometric action-adventure game where the player must use different abilities throughout the game to defeat enemies and solve puzzles.

name: Stunt Paradise
description: Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled ride in Stunt Paradise! Take on epic challenges, perform insane stunts, and experience extreme driving. Buckle up and play now!

name: If: Walls Could Answer
description: What if walls could answer? Whatever that means, you’ll explore the memories of a neurotic scientist resolving puzzles that could help his mental state, discovering different endings of his life.

name: Swapshot
description: In Swapshot, you take control of this fearless protagonist, equipped with an incredible teleportation gun. Your mission is to overcome a series of challenges in a world filled with 2D platforms and intriguing puzzles.

name: Hope is Gone
description: A retro-style first-person horror game set in a dark, decaying parallel dimension where people from our world are not welcome.

name: 69 Balls
description: A Third-Person shooting game but you are not a person. You are a BALL! Imagine a pool ball, a shotgun and football mechanics mashed together! You said you can't? Neither do I! Just shoot everything you see and pray if the black ball goes in!

name: Chemical
description: A first-person action role-playing game where you encounter enemies and explore new spaces to progress.

name: Ball Bash
description: Ball Bash is a fast paced social racing game, where you can use customized ability sets to gain an advantage over your opponents. Dash through procedurally generated tracks and environments, and use your skills to avoid the incoming obstacles. Be the last one standing!

name: Multitales
description: Crazy competitive top-down shooter in the multiverse of fairy tales and legends.

name: Hearth's Pantheon
description: A narrative-driven, old school JRPG about an island haunted by fractured ghosts and corrupted deities. Help Maya & friends restore lost memories and piece together Hearth Island's mysterious past so that humans and ghosts can share a bright future!

name: V-Air Traffic Control
description: Become an air traffic controller in this immersive simulator! In VR, guide planes on the ground and in the air, manage traffic flow, and avoid collisions in challenging scenarios. Experience the rush of the tower and hone your skills as a controller in this realistic, Early Access simulation game.

name: Strategy Game but With a Penguin Who Has a Sword
description: Fight monsters with your cool tactics in this relaxing strategy rougelite game.

name: Crackin' Smackin
description: A chaotic stoneage arena brawler with destructible levels for up to 8 players. Customize your character and jump into action!

name: Moon Magic Array
description: This is an open-world 2.5d magic game with a rich story It has eight combat systems The main character's battle system is to draw a magic array, You can also create spells, or customize spell trajectories

name: Noxious Weeds
description: Face the corruption that poisons your harvest! Noxious Weeds is an action rogue-lite where you slay hordes of creatures with the help of cute veggies and a combination of your favorite tools. The harvest is power. Choose wisely!

name: Reel Life
description: Reel Life is a slot machine-centric farming sim where luck, rather than scale, helps to determine your fiscal success. Farming, fishing, mining and more – collect goods to sell from slot machines scattered throughout the world. Leave it all to fate or game the system to make your dreams come true!

name: Karen the Chicken
description: A beautiful and nonsense 3D adventure game. You are Karen the chicken and you need to solve puzzles to escape from Mr. Boris' farm. Ways to escape? Several. Your objective? Find them all. Are you up to the challenge? Or are you going to chicken out?

name: Aggregate Core
description: A FPS Extraction game where players are able to cooperatively explore and clear a procedurally generated world. Collect Loot and complete missions, while progressing through a woven in story.

name: Cube Clash: Rumble and Smash
description: Rumble and smash! Cube Clash is an online fighting game in which you can pick a unique historically and pop-culture inspired cube fighter and smash your friends in sequences of one-hit rounds games.

name: Fall from Space
description: A new and original game for the Gameboy, Fall from Space is a non-linear action RPG with an epic story spanning a solar system.

name: Vesna
description: Vesna is an indie made fantasy, turn-based game. Made using Unreal Engine.

name: Creatures of Ravenwood
description: Play as a hero fighting off enemies in the forest. Advance and learn new abilities to become stronger, but so will the enemies. Can you survive the mystical creatures of Ravenwood?

name: Stardust Defenders
description: Stardust Defenders is a tower defense, roguelike, bullet hell, where you will face hordes of enemy creatures with the power of forest spirits, leveling up and choosing upgrades that will allow you to survive.

name: With Eyes of Ice
description: An atmospheric, dramatic otome visual novel set in Iceland in the 1850s. Follow the kind-hearted heroine, Gréta, as she finds herself caught between the affections of three handsome men who care for her in different ways.

name: The Last Hero: Journey to the Unknown
description: In a world dominated by evil, only one hero against many enemies, explore, conquer, and don't give up if you get lost! Help our hero in this platform game in the fight against the forces of evil.

name: Exorsite
description: TPS/RTS You are an avatar whose soul can leave the body on a mission to resolve a conflict shrouded in mystery. Discover your purpose as you fight the enemy with 2 perspectives and different units at your disposal in a human war created by specters and demons.

name: Setheria: A Quest for Moonaris
description: Build, craft and survive in this co-op RPG adventure in the hostile islands of Setheria. Choose a hero and play your role in the team. Specialize your character depending on the needs of your team with rich talent and gear system.

name: Chrome Sweat
description: A semi-open world RPG set in a cyberpunk universe. Inspired by games like Deus Ex, Chrome Sweat grants players a wide degree of class customization options and in-game choices. Your decisions will impact the fate of this city and its denizens.

name: Terminal 81
description: Thanks to the financial crisis of 2008, Lorena migrated to Terminal 81 to work, but what seemed like a simple Latin American neighborhood, it was a dangerous region dominated by a mysterious criminal organization that carries out murders, kidnappings and human trafficking.

name: ToroFun
description: Torofun puts at your fingertips more than 50 social and casual games such as ludo, dominoes, various versions of checkers, rummy, backgammon, buraco, poker and bingo, among many others.

name: Vecter Assault
description: Vecter Assault is an action packed multiplayer sci-fi shooter game. Battle against your opponents in unique 360 degree environments and diverse battlegrounds to be the last man standing or with the most number of kills.

name: Poop Killer 7
description: Poop Killer 7 is a sequel inspired by the trash horror movies of the 80's and 90's. Using references from the movie "Scary Movie" among others... Mixing horror and comedy creating a bizarre and funny experience.

name: The Lost Adventure
description: The Lost Adventure - is a straightforward 2D game in which the main hero must escape from a dungeon and recover lost memories. You will encounter battles against bloodthirsty slimes, cunning goblins, and numerous other dangers that await you.

name: Finely Diced
description: Chefs are mercurial at the best of times, and catastrophically explosive at their worst. In this hospitality roguelite, your family's restaurant is balanced on a knifes edge. You have the ingredients, the stove is on, now you just need to cook.

name: Pocket Oasis
description: Pocket Oasis is a hand painted gardening game. Decorate balconies in cities around the globe. Watch your seedlings grow, bloom, and harvest your own fruit.

name: Dunk Dunk
description: Dunk with or on your friends in Dunk Dunk, a multiplayer action basketball arcade party game full of chaotic fun. Familiar platforming controls plus unique stretchy arm controls make for nail-bitingly tough matches. Dress up your dunker and get ready to dunk across the universe!

name: UFO: Extraterrestrials Platinum
description: UFO: Extraterrestrials PLATINUM is a new edition that includes a number of changes and enhancements that give the player a new perspective on the classic game: new alien species, heavy weapon platforms, heavy mortar fire, crash site bombardment, unique items, global UFO swarms and configurability.

name: Tutenstone
description: In Tutenstone, you play as an adventurer who has discovered an ancient pyramid filled with valuable treasures. However, many treasures are hidden behind stone blocks that need to be destroyed.

name: Tower of the Mad Wizard
description: In this brutal action, rogue-like, survival RPG chose one of many wily adventurers dead set on conquering the Mad Wizard's Tower. To reach the his sanctum you must conquer hordes of enemies, their ruthless generals and navigate the twisted halls of the Wizard's labyrinth.

name: Power Vacuum
description: Power Vacuum is a fast-paced, competitive strategy game. It aims for minimalism, stripping away all the unnecessary detail to let you play as fast as you can. Power Vacuum features a “play against your past self” system that automatically records the games you (and your friends!) play.

name: High Velocity Arena
description: High Velocity Arena is a refreshing take on the top-down shooter genre, boasting surprisingly nuanced yet satisfyingly snappy movement and gunplay. Pick between five classes, dozens of loadouts, and slide into 5v5 battles to dominate your opponents in Payload, KOTH, Attack-Defense, and more.

name: SnowRunner: The Mastodon
description: Expand your vehicle collection with The Mastodon DLC to receive the ZikZ 612H "Mastodon", a super-large, super-heavy beast of a truck with 3 built-in trailer slots! The Mastodon DLC is not included in the Year 1, Year 2 or Year 3 Pass.

name: A Whisper in the Twilight: Chapter One
description: An ancient moon shrouded in mystery. Alien enigmas. An adventure beyond the Earth.

name: The Search: Lost Dreams
description: The Search: Lost Dreams is a game made for players focused on fun and gameplay. Improve your combat arsenal, equipments and learn skills that will help you survive on this hostile planet.

name: Queen of the Otaku: There can be Only One
description: A short visual novel about a manga club torn between its two competing princesses.

name: Roober
description: Roober is a worm who is looking for a way out of the jungle, your task is to help him find his way. The problem is, the jungle is a maze! Be careful: in the jungle, traps and moving platforms are waiting for you.

name: Edmund and Eliza
description: Edmund and Eliza is a medieval action adventure game about a knight named Edmund Dantes who ventures into a mysterious village in search of a merchant's missing daughter named Eliza Bonteri. Edmund and Eliza is a senior design capstone project for California State University of Northridge.

name: Exolotl: Zian
description: Zian the Exolotl need to save their planet from King Orion invasion Platform game adventure with 5 Exolotl Character which can be switch character, you can use it in each different level with special moving and ability.

name: Inside the Labs
description: Inside the Labs is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. News of possible failed human experiments within an abandoned lab has piqued your curiosity. Uncover evidence and identify the mutation whilst avoiding the darkness that no longer trusts humans.

name: Equan the Watchful Guardian
description: Equan, the Watchful Guardian is a challenging retro platformer in which players control, Equan, an intergalactic soldier, racing against time in a hunt for eldritch monsters before they destroy the universe. The problem is, Equan keeps finding himself dead.

name: Crystal Tower Defense
description: Stop an endless hoard of crystal-type enemies from reaching the portal to earth! You can build your own labyrinths, unlock new turrets, upgrade them, and also gather permanent bonuses.

name: Uncaptive
description: Uncaptive is a sokoban puzzle with a dark horror atmosphere. With the main character, you will pass through a dark dungeon. Each level is a room with a door that takes you further underground. Solve puzzles, go deeper in the dungeon, and investigate what creature lives in this dark place

name: Press Axe
description: It's a game to find the legendary duck using a double-edged axe.

name: Zodiark Reform: Bandage Rewind
description: The mysterious planet observer, Lance, arrives on this planet to investigate something, and Bandagemon, as a companion on the journey. 《Bandage Rewind》 is a 2D platform puzzle game where you need to rely on your observation skills and intuition to solve various puzzles .

name: Blind Fishes
description: The friendly blind fishes are in danger! Solve the puzzles and save them.

name: Station 13
description: Help the astronaut escape from Station 13 and survive the LAH 13.000 AI and all the traps in a handcrafted platformer game.

name: Dubai Simulator
description: In Dubai Simulator, you'll have the chance to design and build your dream city, complete with towering skyscrapers, bustling streets, luxurious resorts, and awe-inspiring landmarks.

name: Deadly Delivery
description: Deadly Delivery is a first person horror game. Your goal is to deliver a package to an abandoned psychiatric hospital. Could it be that the address is wrong? Or maybe the hospital is getting renovated? Who knows… You better deliver the package as soon as possible.

name: Gotchaball
description: Gotchaball is a multiplayer fictional sports game. Players try to score points by capturing totems to win the game. Chase your opponent, tackle and steal the ball from others! Keep hold of it while capture totems to score points! Collect and use coins to capture totems even faster!

name: Breach: Chicago War Zone
description: Survive the bloody war between The Archangels, The Outfit, and The Cartels. Roll the dice—and face the consequences of your actions!

name: Tesla's Puzzles of Lights
description: Solve mastermind Nikola Tesla's* puzzles to prove yourself worthy to be his student. Start with only a few lights lit and discover each puzzle along the way. Move the lights around and combine their colors to activate every light. Challenge your logical skills in 150 puzzles. Are you bright enough?

name: Mini Drifters: World Racing '89
description: Up to 8 players compete in local multiplayer racing madness! Classic arcade action awaits as you drift, smash and blast through over 50 courses across 3 unique game-modes. Whether you're playing the race, battle or hockey modes there's only one guarantee: a single screen of glorious retro mayhem.

name: The Puppeteer
description: In this short yet challenging action-adventure game, traverse various lands seeking to piece together the methods and madness of The Puppeteer. Craft unique potions to contend with hordes of enemies and uncover secrets rewarded by exploration.

name: Ascend of Arlo
description: Ascend of Arlo is a single-player action RPG. Deprived of your strength and memories, you must fight the evil that threatens the world. Crafting, blacksmithing, and magic are at your disposal. Do whatever it takes to reclaim everything.

name: Serafina's Saga: Awakened
description: In this otome-style visual novel, journey from the depths of the jungle to the royal halls of Castle Krondolee. Young Serafina must uncover the dark secrets of her past and choose whom to trust in this dramatic adventure of romance and intrigue.

name: Gennady
description: An old-school action platformer with rogue-lite elements. Imagine your grumpy neighbor blowing up the backside of an alien world with a blaster instead of resting after his shift. Blood, noir, and green slime.

name: Exit From: Director's Cut
description: You wake up from the noise of thunderstorms, no one there. You are trying to get out and realize that after all you are not alone here... Сan You Exit From?

name: Metania
description: Metania is an Indie Psyhological Horror game uses Physics to pass obstacles Interaction with lights Objects doors furniture etc.

name: Pandora's Box
description: A space themed arcade adventure in psychedelic pixel arts, collect coins to customize your ship color and background as you get through far away galaxies.

name: Buildy Stacky 2
description: Construct towering structures with unconventional building segments, stabilize, detonate, shrink, grow, and stick segments with special powers, all while navigating increasingly difficult challenges in this wacky and brain-teasing game that will delight players of all ages and skill levels.

name: Cuttlefish
description: From the creators of 'Erica', Cuttlefish is a full throttle interactive heist caper perfect for the whole family. Combining intense intricate interactions with a heartfelt branching narrative, Cuttlefish brings you directly into a story about family, survival and safety.

name: Gearhead Karting
description: The ultimate kart racing game with deep customization, realistic physics, and a variety of game modes. Build, tune, and race your way to victory!

name: Operator: Observation
description: Operator: Observation is a Game based on the "Watch Rooms, and Report Anomalies" Concept of "Observation Duty" but now the Anomalies are way more aggressive and have way more ways to make you lose your Mind. Your Instructor will follow you on the way to becoming a good Operator.

name: Barbarossa
description: Join the swashbuckling fun of Barbarossa, an open-world pirate game. Battle pirates, trade goods, conquer islands, and become a legendary captain. Experience thrilling adventures and a simulated economy in this exciting pirate-themed game!

name: Moonchild
description: Moonchild is a turn-based RPG set in 2000s America, with a strong emphasis on strategizing and combining abilities and passive buffs. Combine your different party members' abilities in order to effectively destroy your enemies, as you explore the whimsical state of Frankland, USA!

name: Maximum Tough Guy
description: "A peaceful village and peaceful daily life were suddenly disturbed by the slimes. These creatures, which used to be quiet, suddenly became active. It seems that an investigation is needed to figure out why this has happened."

name: Elidriel
description: Raise your weapons! In a world ruled by a tyrant, there is no other option but to be strong. Elidriel is a pixel-art RPG set in a fantasy world where technology, science, magic, and religion coexist.

name: Check the Room 13
description: Check the Room 13: Unravel the Hotel's Haunted Past - Immerse yourself in this chilling 4K, 60fps adventure as Sarah uncovers the eerie secrets of a grand hotel. Navigate supernatural forces, solve cryptic puzzles, and escape the malevolent grasp of the sinister entity.

name: Eventide
description: A free noir/cyberpunk horizontal scrolling shoot 'em up. Gameplay inspired by late 80's / early 90's arcade shoot 'em ups.

name: Interstellar Sentinel
description: A thrilling sci-fi fantasy shmup / shoot'em up with epic boss battles and a vast arsenal of futuristic weapons! Battle legions of demonic entities, restore the cosmic balance, and save the universe! Flow state gaming to unleash your inner hero! Feel your skills grow on your way to 1CC S+ tier rank!

name: Maces and Dices
description: Make the most out of every turn when dice decide your fate. When your means of movement and attack, as well as your healthbar consist of dice, you better hope you have brought the right ones.

name: Doom Delta
description: Doom Delta is a GZDoom mod that aims to bring many elements from the pre-release iterations of Doom, from the press release beta to the original design document by Tom Hall.

name: Doom Repainted
description: If you were expecting a professional, well-made, serious mod you've come to the wrong place.

name: Doom: The Way We Remember It
description:
.. Literally.

Also given the names 'Mandela Doom', 'Doom But Something's Not Right' and 'Doom from Memory', we recreated the whole game from memory.

name: Doom 2: The Way We Remember It
description: The entire of Doom 2, including music, text, levels, and some graphics, but from memory. Even includes MAP33, plus 2 bonus maps.

name: They Speak From The Abyss: Zenith
description: A standalone prequel to They Speak From The Abyss. Travel through the realm of despair and head towards the Zenith point. In the distance lies the mighty mansion Melancholia. Will you only find glory, agony, or freedom?

name: Dark Tales: Mirror and Mad Princess
description: A dark mobile RPG based on classic fairy tales.

name: Traumakt-4.Sexe
description: A Domino Club Production by Protag Nude Incorporated Software.

name: Behind The Red Dais
description: Flowers of love and pain.

name: Corsairs: Battle of the Caribbean
