description: An immersive adventure and strategy game set amidst the thrilling world of buccaneering. As a shrewd captain, navigate tumultuous seas, engage in complex politics, and manage a diverse crew to establish maritime dominance and ensure your fleet's future.

name: Gateway to Hell
description: A isometric game where you must find the exit in a labyrinth castle.

name: Yuuma Game
description: A short Action-Puzzle Shoot-em-up Touhou fan game starring everyone's favourite gluttonous goat, Toutetsu Yuuma.

name: Dragon Quest X: Nemureru Yuusha to Michibiki no Meiyuu Offline
description: The V2 expansion from Dragon Quest X Online remade as DLC for Dragon Quest X Offline

name: Monstrosity
description:
It's a brand new day and you're in charge of the facilities new monstrosity!

Take good care of it and make sure to write everything down you observe, your job and your life depends on it!

name: DJMax Respect V: V Extension IV Pack
description: Meet the 'DJMax Respect V Original Song' package now! This DLC contains a total of 20 Original songs.

name: As Aventuras de Zé Baldinho
description: As Aventuras de Zé Baldinho is a challenging educational platformer that addresses environmental issues and the reuse of organic waste and is full of references to the History of Art.

name: Duke Nukem Collection 1
description:
He's back! Duke Nukem debuts on Evercade with this first collection, including the brand new Duke Nukem 1 + 2 Remastered!

Tackle the forces of Dr. Proton and fight off the evil Rigelatins in this rebuilt anthology of the first two Duke Nukem games. Then take the leap to 3D with the first person classic, Duke Nukem 3D: Total Meltdown. All presented here on one physical Evercade Cartridge and including a full colour manual.

name: Duke Nukem Collection 2
description:
Duke Nukem Collection 2 takes a deeper look into the history of the Duke Nukem Franchise!

Enter the third person world of Duke Nukem's adventures with Time to Kill and its sequel Land of the Babes. Then enjoy the handheld first person marvel that is Duke Nukem Advance, a completely original story. All available on one Evercade Cartridge with a full colour manual included.

name: Bloom Defender
description: The Mother Tree, a sacred being capable of producing spiritual energy, is under attack! Defend her by planting and watering trees in this top-down tower-defense game.

name: Pokémon Giovanni Origins
description:
In this story, set roughly 20 years before the events of Pokémon Red and Pokémon Blue, you play as the childhood friend of Team Rocket Boss Giovanni.

Growing up in Saffron City, you and Giovanni will traverse Kanto and Johto together, challenging for gym badges and championships along the way. You will witness first hand the backstory of Giovanni, watching from the sidelines as your friend ventures down a dark path, turning to a life of crime.

As you explore Kanto and Johto, you will see the vast difference 20 years can make to a region. You will find characters and references to the future games hidden everywhere you look. Enjoy exploring the Pokémon world long before the stories of legendary Pokémon trainers such as Red and Blue.

name: Hentai Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Kawaii girls are broken into pieces. Can you reunite them by completing these jigsaw puzzles?

name: Hentai Jigsaw Puzzle 2
description: Someone broke sexy girls into pieces. It is your job to assemble them back! Enjoy high quality sexy jigsaw puzzles with a hot Japanese commentator!

name: New Master Quest
description: A mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time that includes new dungeons.

name: Toys vs. Nightmares
description:
The nightmares have been unleashed from your closet and all you have are some books and toy soldiers….

Strategize and defend yourself from the evil monsters lurking in your closet. Use robots, rubber frogs, and miners to stop the ghosts and make it through the night.

name: Ojanko Yakata
description: Ojanko Yakata is an adult mahjong.

name: Donut Dodo Do!
description:
Donut Dodo Do! is an exclusive for exA-Arcadia Cabinets.
Up to 2 players can climb, jump and run to collect all of the stolen donuts through 6 unique stages. Even casual players can play with this game by moving the joystick and pressing the single button to jump.

Choose to play up to 3 loops in the Arcade mode or go for the high score in Score Attack mode.

name: Palavras Cruzadas: O Globo
description: Crossword made for the journalistic website "O Globo".

name: Indie Heroes Collection 3
description:
Indie Heroes Collection 3 will feature all 9 indie Game of the Month releases for 2023 along with some extra titles to be revealed ahead of its release in February 2024.

Game of the Month adds a free game through monthly system updates that are removed with the next release. The monthly games starting in April as part of this bundle were Donut Dodo, Thunder Paws, Big2Small, Magic & Legend: Time Knights and currently Doodle World: Redrawn.

name: Sudoku: O Globo
description: Sudoku made for the journalistic website "O Globo".

name: Duke Nukem Remastered
description: A remaster by Blaze Entertainment as part of Duke Nukem 1+2 Remastered which is set to be released exclusively for Evercade in Duke Nukem Collection 1.

name: Duke Nukem II Remastered
description: A remaster by Blaze Entertainment as part of Duke Nukem 1+2 Remastered which is set to be released exclusively for Evercade in Duke Nukem Collection 1.

name: Forgotten War
description: A "historical" strategy on the theme of wars of different times and peoples with funny characters and nice graphics. The game has a campaign with 16 levels and a sandbox.A "historical" strategy on the theme of wars of different times and peoples with funny characters and physics.

name: A Postcard From Afthonia
description:
Once upon a time, two seemingly different creatures decided to have a baby. (Such things are possible in the Lands of Dream.) But it was a time of revolution and war, and they were worried about their baby's future, so they asked you to help them seek the wisdom of the Oracle…

A Postcard From Afthonia is a short excursion to the Isle of the Sun via the means of a magical portal. Said portal connects to events that take place after The Sea Will Claim Everything, but can be nevertheless be used by someone who has not taken that journey yet.

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 1 Character Pass
description:
Year 1 Character Pass
- 4 additional characters (Rashid, A.K.I., Ed, Akuma)
- 4 additional characters' colors: Outfit 1 Colors 3-10
- Purchase bonus: 4,200 Drive Tickets

name: GetBackers Dakkanya: Dakkan da yo! Zenin Shuugou!!
description: GetBackers Dakkanya: Dakkandayo! Zenin Shuugou!! is a beat 'em up videogame released only in Japan by Konami for the PS2 in 2003.

name: Athena Crisis
description: Athena Crisis is a modern retro turn-based strategy game inspired by Advance Wars. Athena Crisis places you in command of distinct units including infantry, tanks, and air forces in your journey across multiple worlds. Embark on a challenging single-player quest or dive into the thrill of ranked or casual multiplayer modes.

name: Love and Demons
description:
Love and Demons is an hilarious Isekai Parody Visual Novel game where you control the fate of Maximillian, a young and naive prince who accidentally enters a portal and finds himself in a mysterious and dangerous demon realm.
In Love and Demons, you play as Maximillian, a charming but clueless prince who quickly becomes the object of desire for the demon realm's most beautiful girls. Keep an eye on your level of coverage and carefully choose your responses, or your disguise will disappear.

Made with a custom engine in Love and Demons you can choose your own path, make decisions that will impact the story, and watch as your choices lead to different outcomes and endings.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter hilarious scenes, absurd puzzles, wild romance, some bugs, and a lot of bad endings.

Will you choose to fight your way through the demon realm or win the hearts of the girls who cross your path? The choice is yours.

name: DekaPari
description:
Your childhood sweetheart is dead. As you reminisce, you notice looming over her eternal site of rest, adorned with flowers, is a giant girl with a familiar face.

DekaPari is a spin-off of Towelket, a long running indie RPG Maker adventure series. Unlike previous entries, DekaPari's exploration is mostly in 2D as opposed to the isometric style. It is described by the developer as a "comfy pixel art RPG."

name: February 2003
description: Sin descripción

name: Princess Poffin and the Spider Invasion
description:
Princess Poffin and the Spider Invasion is a tiny adventure game made in one week for games made QVIIK.

The moth kingdom has been covered in spiderwebs! It's up to Poffin to find the spider responsible, and restore her kingdom to its former web-free glory!

name: DZ & Riggy vs. the Worlds II
description:
The follow-up to DZ and Riggy vs the World(s), the two aforementioned heroes have transitioned from platformer to RPG and must now save Earth from being taken over by a video game villain that is very personal to the two who has come to life!

DZ and Riggy must traverse through various game worlds such as Final Fantasy VI, Kirby, Pokemon, Super Mario, and many more to rescue their friends and save the day.

name: Rain on their Parade!
description:
Side-scrolling rain shooting (?) game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 53.

You’re a rain delivery cloud at Cloud Academy, but you’re on your way to flunking the year!

(Nobody told you that raining cats and dogs wasn’t meant to be literal...)

Pass these rainy assignments or you’ll be stuck on golf course sprinkler duty all summer!

name: Q4Max
description: Q4Max adds features which make Quake 4 suitable for use for competitive play (such as timeouts, teamlock, brightskins, chattokens, auto action demo recording), fixes and general improvements to the base game, without changing the underlying Quake 4 gameplay. This makes Q4Max the standard mod for competitive play, and it was used by all the major eSports competitions - CPL, ESWC, WSVG, GGL, CB, QuakeCon, and more.

name: Tube Baby
description:
Control the test-tube in which the sperm meet the ovum to create a baby!
Addictive gravity balance game include 60 levels!

name: Storybook Weaver
description:
"Storybook Weaver" is a 1990 educational program for the Apple IIGS developed by Charolyn Kapplinger, Patricia Korn, John J. Krenz, Brian S. Nesse, Jean Sharp, and Steve Zehm, and distributed by MECC. The program allowed children to create their own stories using provided images, sound effects, and music.

It was later released in 1992 for DOS with some graphical upgrades, and for Windows in 1995 as "Storybook Weaver: Classic Edition". It was followed by an enhanced version, called Storybook Weaver Deluxe, released in 1994.

name: The Shell Part I: Inferno
description:
The secrets of a case from six years prior may just be the key to the current unending cycle of tragedy, and the thing that cracks this woeful world’s shell may be one girl’s smile.

The Shell Part I: Inferno is the Steam release of the visual novel set in the Showa era, depicting the story of a detective who receives a request from a young girl and uncovers the secret hidden within her.

name: New Super Mario Bros 3. DS
description: An exhaustive hack of New Super Mario Bros DS, this hack replaces all of the level layouts with those of Super Mario Bros. 3, along with a couple of other miscellaneous levels from other games.

name: Walpurgisnacht
description: Memory of forest house at dusk.

name: Marathon: Istoria
description:
Marathon: Istoria is an RPG scenario set in the Marathon universe and designed for the Aleph One engine. It pushes the engine to its limits by using advanced character progression, combat, and storytelling.

Customize your character by choosing your class and deciding which weapons you want to specialize in. Utilize the conventional weapons you are familiar with along with a brand new arsenal of spells and abilities. Explore Istoria while discovering its secrets and how you fit in the world through a combination of terminals and communicating with the recently deceased.

People that have played other Bungie games may recognize some influences from Pathways Into Darkness and Myth. A few sounds, the weapon leveling, level transitions with saved state, and ability to talk to the dead are ideas largely taken from PiD. People familiar with Myth may recognize a couple of the spells you get in the game.

name: Meteor World Actor: Badge & Dagger
description: Superpowered detective noir. Maverick detective Ruka Hiryu pursues criminals by day⁠—and ices perps by night...

name: Apotheosis X
description:
Apotheosis X pushes the boundaries of what's possible aesthetically with the marathon engine whilst retaining its low resolution 90's charm.

The campaign features engaging combat that scales with player skill and aggression, with a roster of new enemies and weaponry that compliments the original games' nuance and high skill ceiling.

name: The Half-Life 2 Exhibit
description: Sin descripción

name: Intrasslad
description: Sin descripción

name: HWY 17
description: Sin descripción

name: Bad Ethics
description: Sin descripción

name: Anomalous Materials
description: Sin descripción

name: Construct Conspiracy
description: Sin descripción

name: Gnome Heist
description: Sin descripción

name: Mesa
description: Sin descripción

name: Duke
description: Sin descripción

name: Half-Chamber
description: Sin descripción

name: Madness Combat
description: Sin descripción

name: Jax Payne – Part 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Breenstein
description: Sin descripción

name: Kill the Man in the House
description: A short, visceral first-person shooter about killing a man in a house.

name: Titans Clinic VR
description: Explore Titans Clinic - a casual VR game, you are a dental doctor for the Titans! A titan comes to you with problems and your task is to find solutions for them using various tools inside the game!

name: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves: Drake's Fortune Multiplayer Pack
description:
The Drake's Fortune Multiplayer Pack was a DLC pack that could be bought via the PlayStation Store to be used in the multiplayer of Uncharted 2: Among Thieves. It contained six skins and two new large maps from Uncharted: Drake's Fortune: The Facility and The Flooded Ruins.

It also added 12 new Trophies.

name: Everslaught Invasion
description: Get ready for the ultimate VR action game with Everslaught Invasion! Choose from three unique classes, then team up with a friend online to take on hordes of enemies and defeat the Great Corruption. Run, dash, jump, and grapple your way through large dark fantasy environments.

name: Super Drift 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves: Siege Expansion Pack
description:
The Siege Expansion Pack was a DLC pack that could be bought via the PlayStation Store to be used in the multiplayer of Uncharted 2: Among Thieves. It contained six skins, two new maps ("The Highrise" and "Museum"), and the Siege Co-op Arena Playlist.

It also added 11 new Trophies.

name: Video 8 Ball
description: Video 8 Ball it's a pool game.

name: 1 Hungry Peasant
description:
1 Hungry Peasant must collect 100 Potatoes.

Created for Moonjam 2021: https://jam.moon2.tv/

name: Blue Nebula
description: Blue Nebula is a fork of Red Eclipse 1. While the Red Eclipse team have moved their game on to another engine for their latest release, 2.0, this also meant a total conversion of the gameplay. Therefore, a group of eager community members have started to fork off Red Eclipse from the last 1.x series release, setting up the necessary infrastructure to (re-)establish a community around Red Eclipse 1.5+.

name: Rescue Pets: My ePets
description: An online flash virtual pet game by MGA Entertainment, similar to Webkinz of the same era. Players could make an account, and by using a code obtained by purchasing a Rescue Pets: MyePets stuffed animal, play with their pet in various minigames. This game is now considered lost media and is impossible to play due to servers being shut down in 2012.

name: CSS Room Escape
description: Can you escape the room in this difficult but fun challenge?

name: Pokémon Stranded
description: Pokemon Stranded departs from traditional Pokemon games in a number of ways. To begin with, there are no Gyms or traditional Pokemon Trainers, no badges, no Pokemon Centers or Marts, and so forth. In addition, the game’s main story will be relatively short and straightforward, but there will be thousands of side stories to follow along the way. The majority of game updates will focus on adding new side quests.

name: Cursed Halo Again
description: Cursed Halo is a mod for Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary that turns the game into a chaotic experience. New Levels, Weapons, Enemy variations, Vehicles, etc.

name: Secret of the Corral
description: This game was made live on Twitch.TV/StephenGeorg on August 26th, 2020, over the course of 10 hours. The audience could submit words/ideas which had to be used in the final game. It's full of community in-jokes and other insanity. The goal was to "finish creating a game in one sitting", which was successful. Between the end of stream and uploading here, a few little Easter eggs were added. Good luck finding them!

name: Puyo Puyo Fever Habanero
description:
Puyo Puyo Fever Habanero is a mobile Puyo game released sometime in 2007 by Sega and was apart of the Sonic Café (later Puyo Puyo! Sega) subscription service, a service in which members pay 300¥ a month for access of an exclusive library of Sega games. This game is known for its very high difficulty compared to its sister games, both Puyo Puyo Fever and Puyo Puyo Fever 2. Like both games, it has a RunRun, WakuWaku and HaraHara course. According to the Suwa3 website, only Amitie and Raffina are playable in the game.

This Puyo game is considered as "lost media" due to the fact that a few sources have provided minimal information regarding Puyo Puyo Fever Habanero.

name: Puyo Puyo Fever Rhythm
description: Puyo Puyo Fever Rhythm was a rhythm mobile puyo game released in 2014 through the PuyoSega service which used music and assets from Puyo Puyo Fever, Puyo Puyo Fever 2, Puyo Puyo 15th Anniversary and Puyo Puyo 7. The service ended on December 28, 2015 and music downloads for those that owned it ended on January 28, 2016.

name: Broadway Legend Ellena
description: Broadway Legend Ellena is a rhythm game released in the Disc Station magazine for PC-98 computers in 1994. The title character, Ellena Stevens, would later cameo in Puyo Puyo DA! for the Sega Dreamcast.

name: Pochi and Nyaa
description: A port for the PlayStation 2 in 2004, with several improvements and new characters.

name: Greenfinger!
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52.

The annual Harvest Festival is here and you’re aiming for first place! Grab your favorite watering can, find some sunshine, and grow your greens to the…beat…?

name: Revival and Exploration
description: Sin descripción

name: Hero Great Wars
description: Sin descripción

name: Harekat 2: Online
description: Sin descripción

name: D-War
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Dice
description:
Eat brains. Don't get shotgunned.
You're a zombie, racing to be the first to eat 13 yummy human brains. But those humans fight back. Press your luck. Keep rolling, keep collecting brains . . . but if you get three shotguns, you're out!

name: Weird Store
description:
You dream of becoming a famous item maker in this world, and in order to fulfill your cherished dream, you need to improve your skills by running this shop.
But running a shop isn't easy: you need to get the materials you need to create the items your customers request, and you have to pay the shop taxes every day. You also have to deal with the fact that your customers might be unhappy with the items you create.
You need to keep your shop open for a long time while maintaining its reputation.

name: Villains Corp.: The Secret Villainy Laboratory
description:
What are you doing today? Let's take over the world! Free the villain inside you and have loads of fun in missions you have never seen before. We are not playing nice here: run your Lab like a mad scientist and create different types of minions to help you in your big evil plan and fight all your arch enemies!
In this manager game you will have to accomplish several missions in order to beat different enemies. Each mission will require specific minions that you will raise in your evil factory! Combine your minions in the diabolic lab and create even more powerful ones, as the drones, the assassins, the beasts, the dragons or even the demons!

name: Yatzy Addict+
description:
Yatzy is one of those strange addictions that is better experienced than explained. It's hard to discover what makes rolling those dice over and over again so fun, but it's beyond delight when you finally see those sixes line up.
Yatzy is a simple brain game that trains analytical thinking. It's a classic board dice game.

name: Turtle Invaders
description: The turtles have decided to take over the underwater Aqua world. The fearless Octoremus has decided to fight back!! In order to stop the turtles, Octoremus must ink the turtles, which magically transport them back to their own lair. The turtles, of course, can fight back.

name: To-Fu Oh! Sushi
description: You are the veritable sushi master! Prepare your own fun sushi with “Daizu” the skunk!

name: Tap Dash
description:
Tap Dash is the frantic, high-tension, addictive arcade dasher that’ll have your heart racing and your hands sweating!
Race to dodge dangerous hazards, rack up your multiplier, and dash through the portal to score big and rule the leaderboard!

name: Steampunk Racing 3D
description: In the realm of steampunk racing domination and destruction is a way of life. Each day we risk death for the rewards and thrills of our chosen path. We are the racers, the heroes of our war torn world. Our vehicles shield us, our weaponry brings forth our vengeance, the world is our playground, and the corporations that run things are a necessary evil.

name: Ro Sham Bo Rush
description:
Rock-Paper-Scissors, RoShamBo, Jan Ken … All these modern games are variations of the Chinese games introduced in the 17th century.
Never played Rock Paper Scissors before? No problem! It's easy! Rock crushes scissors; paper covers rock; scissors cuts paper.
Easy, right? But if it was so easy…

name: Num Yumms
description:
Num Yumms is a surprisingly adorable game about numbers and hungry little monsters.
Move your freshly hatched Num Yumm around the board eating numbered candies. You have 5 moves to total your Num Yumm’s goal. Watch them grow as they eat, discover new Num Yumms, and get the highest score you can.

name: Parking Tycoon
description:
Park on your friend's streets, or catch them parking illegally on yours and write them a huge ticket!
Fully customize your fleet of cars with an array of car modifications that span from whimsical to awesome!
Ticketing is the real fun. The longer you keep cars parked on your friends’ streets, the more money you'll earn, but be careful. Your friends are waiting to steal your cash with ticketing all over the time.

name: Memory Color!
description: The best memory cards game ever! Simple graphics, smooth operation, gorgeous visual effect and the unique endless mode! It's the time to challenge your memory!

name: Matchsticks
description:
Keep your mind active with this classic matches game!
The rules are simple: you must create triangles, squares or fix simple equations by adding, moving or removing matches.

name: Love Me Not
description:
Love Me Not is inspired by the childhood game of picking the petals off of flowers to guess the interest of your crush.
Pick petals to defend your flower from bugs. Break hearts to revive your flower. Survive as long as you can to beat your friends’ hi score. Your garden is constantly changing with vibrant colors as the cosmos scrolls across the sky.

name: Jurassic Dinosaur
description:
Welcome to Jurassic Dinosaur, the dino park management game where you can build and expand your very own prehistoric paradise! Create a Jurassic playground for your visitors by unlocking and nurturing a wide range of realistic and awe-inspiring dinosaurs. From the mighty T-Rex to the gentle Brachiosaurus, these prehistoric beasts require your utmost care and attention to ensure they are well-fed, healthy, and happy.
But it's not just about the dinosaurs - you must also design and construct your park to attract visitors and generate revenue. Build roads, amenities, and attractions, and use your earnings to expand and enhance your park. Strategically place amenities to keep visitors happy, and monitor the health and happiness of your dinosaurs to ensure their well-being.
As the park owner, it's up to you to make strategic decisions that will impact the success of your park. Use research to unlock new dinosaur species and features, and stay ahead of the game by managing natural disasters and dinosaur diseases that will test your management skills and keep the gameplay fresh and exciting.
With endless hours of entertainment, Jurassic Dinosaur is a thrilling mobile game that offers something for everyone, from dinosaur enthusiasts to park management fans. Download now and start your own prehistoric adventure today!

name: I Spy Fun House
description: Solve I Spy riddles to earn tickets to a Fun House, a topsy-turvy world where nothing is as it appears! Master brain-teasing puzzles and play exciting games while exploring the Fun House. The game is based on I Spy Fun House and is a remake of the DS version of this game.

name: Bash It!
description: A game of pesky moles!

name: Break the Balloons: Ghost Town
description:
Ghost Town is a perfect kingdom for all kind of fears and horrors until...
The Cats came. And they can detect Ghosts, disturb them, hunt them...
You, the new Ghost hero in Town, lead us to destroy all Cat's balloons to drop them, bring back fear to the land!

name: Brothers: Clash of Fighters
description:
Brothers: Clash of Fighters is the official game of the Brothers Bollywood movie starring Akshay Kumar and Sidharth Malhotra. It is an arcade street fighting game featuring one-on-one close combat fight style with 3D animated life like characters of Akshay and Sidharth as well as a roster of international fighters.
Compete as David or Monty in arcade mode and fight the greats of MMA wrestling over 3 rounds in one killer battle for supremacy. If you’re in it for the long run, then compete in the tournament mode where each fight is more difficult than the next and the stakes are higher than ever. Win every match or face a disgraceful knockout in this war of the legends.

name: Dungeon Mania
description: Sin descripción

name: Domino Merged Puzzle
description:
Classic Domino Merged Puzzle is free now. It's the most famous puzzle and brain game.
As a classic puzzle game, Domino Merged Puzzle is popular for a long time. No matter elderly, women,children,housewives or pretty girls all love Domino Merged Puzzle. Domino Merged Puzzle is a very funny and happy game. Enjoy it with your family.

name: DaiPyooon
description:
Daikon radish jumps.
Avoid obstacles and aim for the high score.
A new action game with simple controls.

name: Dice Craft
description:
It is the first, real-time, strategic game to construct buildings by moving the board with dice, collect resources, and knock the opponent with bombardment and magic.
This is the real-time game opponent and I move at the same time.

name: Cupky Jump
description:
Have you ever played running games like Temple Run, Subway Surfers or jumping games like Geometry Dash, Doodle Jump? Now get more of the exhilarating running, jumping and turning you love in Cupky Jump!
Jump and Jump, fly your way in the world of cake and candy, collect the hidden gems to perfect the score!

name: Famory
description:
Famory is a game to train and test your memory, there are 144 levels for adults and 36 levels for younger children in the Kids Mode. There are levels with animal sounds, musical instruments, vehicles and of course a lot of levels with (lots of different) images.
Your concentration and your memory can improve by playing Famory. It's not the ultimate cure for Alzheimer or other brain diseases but it's always good to train your brain and stay mentally fit in a fun way!

name: Gravillipse
description:
Get Gravillipse Now and dive deep into space!
How long will you survive the pressure, while the whole universe starts to move around you?

name: Hard Racing
description: Hard Racing is a top-down racer style with Stunning and photorealistic Graphics.

name: Fighter Online
description: Hard-core street fighters, bring it on!. Show us what you’ve got.

name: Madou Monogatari: Tower of the Magician
description: Madou Monogatari: Tower of the Magician is a first-person dungeon-crawler developed by Compile. It was first released on September 6, 1997 for Microsoft Windows 95 through Disc Station Vol. 16. Unlike most Madou Monogatari games which follow Arle, this game follows Schezo Wegey and his quest for power as he ascends Wish's tower.

name: Madojeongi: Secret of Elysium
description:
Madou Monogatari: Secret of Elysium is a first-person dungeon-crawler with minimal to no numerical statuses. The player navigates the maze-like floors of the towers by solving puzzles and defeating enemies.

Madou Monogatari: Secret of Elysium was only released in Korea.

name: Madou Monogatari
description:
Madou Monogatari is a first-person dungeon-crawler developed by AIKY that released on December 14, 2005 for DoCoMo's i-mode branded mobile phones and was available through G-mode's R.P.G-mode service, which required a monthly fee of 300 yen to access various RPG games. It is the last Madou Monogatari entry to feature the original cast of characters created by Compile. The game was only available to download for six months before being delisted sometime in June 2006, and as of November 30, 2021, the game can no longer be launched due to G-mode's service through i-mode being discontinued.

Unlike Madou Monogatari (Saturn), Madou Monogatari returns to the classic first-person dungeon crawling style. A new spell, Stone, is introduced that attacks enemies with falling stones, and after clearing the game you'll be presented with a report card that changes depending on the amount of steps Arle takes, the amount of damage done to enemies, and the number of times that curry is eaten.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Pure Fire Edition
description:
Wal-mart Exclusive! Boost your fun with HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED 2 - Turbocharged - Pure Fire Edition, which contains:
• Full game
• Twin MillTM diecast car with an amazing exclusive livery;
• HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED 2 - Rust and Fast Pack, which includes two vehicles (Mod Rod and FusionBusta)
• HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED 2 - Speed Kings Pack, which includes two vehicles (Impavido 1 and Electro Silhouette)
• HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED 2 - Just a Scratch Pack, which includes two vehicles (Speed Bump and Sudden Stop)

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Day One Edition
description:
The ultimate racing game is back — and more charged up than ever!

Over 130 vehicles, including new types like motorbikes and ATVs, five new environments with racing surfaces impacting vehicle performance and creating more dynamic gameplay, new driving unique strategies as like lateral dashes and jumps to ensure more wild races, a story-driven campaign, and a variety of exciting new game modes.

The multiplayer experience is enriched thanks to the Cross-play feature, online ranking and PC anti-cheat system. And a lot of ways to show off your creativity are available with the renewed track editor and brand-new stickers for unique vehicle liveries.

name: Madden NFL 24
description: Experience the newest iteration of FieldSENSE in Madden NFL 24. More realistic character movement and smarter AI gives you control to play out your gameplay strategy with the confidence to dominate any opponent.

name: Mir Tankov
description: The world famous tank MMO now developed and published by Lesta Games in RUBY region.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Season One: Exclusive Box Edition
description:
MX vs ATV Legends Season One marks the newest addition to the popular MX vs ATV off-road racing franchise. With this game, players can fulfill their dream of becoming a renowned off-road rider, garnering widespread recognition and admiration from fans and sponsors alike. Whether they choose to play the career or online modes, they'll get to experience the thrill of racing to the finish line on bikes, ATVs, and UTVs. This latest instalment also boasts expansive open environments and a comprehensive career mode, allowing players to immerse themselves fully in the world of professional off-road racing and enjoy all the highs and lows that come with it.
MX vs ATV Legends Season One includes 3 extensive DLCs.

name: Waku-waku Ultraman Racing
description:
Waku Waku Ultraman Racing is a Kiddie Ride and Arcade Game based on the Ultraman Series.

Riders sit on Ultraman, and control Ultraman or Ultraseven as they race against several Kaijus and Alien Baltan. At some point during the race, the riders will have to fight Baltan to win the race. The ride ends when the riders reach the goal.

name: Touhou Maiden
description: Hachimitsu Kumasan's massive Touhou fangame RPG. Join Reimu and Marisa in their journey through a fragmented Gensoukyou and Tokyo. All throughout their quest, they fight both familiar and beloved characters... because they must.

name: Dinosaurs: Mission Dino Camp
description: The schleich DINOSAURS have come to life and need your help! Find and rescue the legendary giant creatures while you an embark on an action-filled adventure deep in the amazon jungle.

name: Human: Fall Flat - Dream Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Back 4 Blood: Day One Steelbook Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Paw Patrol: World
description: Explore the world of PAW Patrol like never before and stop Mayor Humdinger’s super blimp mayhem, in a free-roaming 3D adventure full of pup-tastic fun!

name: Seijundrop
description: Your rather quiet classmate's little brother went missing, and she asks you to help her look for him.

name: Fuhrer in LA: Special Edition
description: Fuhrer in a LA is a grindhouse-styled top-down action-adventure game which takes place around 1947, unraveling the truth about the demise of the Fuhrer post World War 2.

name: Masochistic Maiden Aria and the Cavern of Blissful Agony
description: A surprising spin on the precision platforming genre where the character you control reacts rather amusingly to being stabbed by spikes.

name: Dimensional Dexterity
description: Immerse yourself in the innovative gameplay, where the central mechanic revolves around the seamless shifting of Dimensions. With each shift, the world around you transforms, presenting new obstacles to overcome and hidden paths to discover.

name: Wonder Wars
description: Wonder Wars is a strategy mobile-first videogame. Choose your hero and six troops and conquer Mundo Maravilla! Go PVP or PVE and collect all characters to create the best team.

name: Enterprise
description: Sin descripción

name: Flare: Empyrean Campaign
description: The Empyrean Campaign is a game made by the Flare team. The story begins with the player being exiled from their homeland of Empyrean, resulting in them embarking on a quest to regain entry. This journey takes the player through many regions, with plenty of side quests along the way.

name: Vectaria.io
description: Multiplayer browser game in block style, where you can build houses, craft various items, digging dungeons and mines, trade with players and much more!

name: Lisa: Definitive Edition
description: Explore Olathe and its dark and twisted secrets with Lisa: The Definitive Edition, including the original story-driven RPG game Lisa: The Painful and its sequel Lisa: The Joyful

name: Train Kit for A-Ressha de Ikou 2001
description: Sin descripción

name: Switchblade: Epic Pack
description:
The Switchblade Epic Pack includes the full game with additional 10 vehicles to own and use forever.

Fog Hog, Tiny Giant, Thunder Pulse, Berserker, Goofer, Electron, Gravitron
Kamikaze, Safeguard, Healing Hippo

name: Lisa: The Painful - Definitive Edition
description:
LISA: The Painful - Definitive Edition is the newly updated version of the original quirky side-scrolling RPG, set in the post-apocalyptic wasteland of Olathe. Beneath the charming and funny exterior is a world full of disgust and moral destruction. Players will learn what kind of person they are by being FORCED to make choices permanently affecting the gameplay. Make sacrifices to keep your party members alive, whether it's taking a beating for them, losing limbs, or some other inhuman torture. In this world, you will learn being selfish and heartless is the only way to survive...

The Definitive Edition brings new content and nightmares to the game with HD graphics, party member campfire conversations, updated battle systems, new border art overlays, music player, painless (easy) mode, and new secrets to explore.

name: Lisa: The Joyful - Definitive Edition
description:
Lisa: The Joyful - Definitive Edition is the newly updated conclusion to the quirky side-scrolling RPG Lisa series. Explore Olathe as Buddy in your quest to punish the world that has treated you wrong. Along the way, learn about Olathe, your family, and the monsters and men in power. The world’s out to get you… Get. It. Back!

The Definitive Edition brings fresh blood to the game with updated battle systems, 6 brand new Warlord skills, new border art overlays, music player, painless (easy) mode, and new secrets to explore.

name: C.H.A.I.N.G.E.D.
description:
The antichrist has won, the world has ended.
Time to make some choices.

name: Legacy Of The Legends
description:
A PSX Style, Horror, RogueLike, Adventure, MetroidVania Game Made By Digital Artisans Game Team

Available For Microsoft Windows, Linux, And MacOS

name: Irem Collection: Volume 1
description: Irem Collection Volume 1 is a collection of classic legendary arcade shoot 'em up games including Image Fight, Image Fight 2, and X-Multiply brought to modern platforms.

name: Feed Eggs
description: Put as many eggs as you can in its mouth

name: Uncharted 3: Multiplayer
description: Join the Adventure in Uncharted 3: Multiplayer. Download and play Competitive Multiplayer up to level 15 for Free! Access to Cooperative modes, additional Levels, and Game Modes sold separately.

name: Mobile Wars X: Ultimate Simulation Battle
description:
Ultimate Simulation Battle is an expansion for the free game Mobile Wars X that was released as an update on Steam in 2019.

The updated changed the UI and added a 1bit game mode with 3 new characters.

name: Eexy Life: East End X Yuri
description: Sin descripción

name: Spider-Man 3
description:
The Nintendo DS version of Spider-Man 3, a videogame based on the 2007 movie of the same name.

The Nintendo DS version is completely 2.5D and uses the Touch Screen to execute most attacks. Players can put on the black suit at will, but it will be disabled if Spider-Man's health is too low. This version supports wireless multiplayer.

name: Spider-Man 3
description:
The PlayStation 2 and Wii version of Spider-Man 3, a videogame based on the 2007 movie of the same name.

The gameplay in this version closely resembles that of its next-generation counterpart, with the main difference being that the combat system primarily takes place on the ground.

The primary features of the Wii version are motion controls. By flicking the Wii Remote & Nunchuck, the player can perform various actions such as combat, and one of Spider-Man's trademark abilities, web swinging. There are also certain mini-games tailored to the motion controls.

name: Pixel Run!
description:
Pixel run! A perfect game to play when you're calm!
This game has been inspired by Scott Cawthon's game, There Is No Pause Button!

name: Nyctoban
description: You must put all the lamps on their places. You have nyctophobia (fear of the dark) but don't worry, you can do it!

name: University
description:
In this horror game, you get to guard a school
where a previous killing was taken.

Ever been to a haunted school? well, now’s your chance.

name: Evil Dead: The Game - Who's Your Daddy Bundle
description:
Evil Dead: The Game - Who’s Your Daddy Bundle
Packed with fan favorites from the STARZ TV series, Ash vs Evil Dead!
- New Survivor: Brock Williams
- New Demon: Schemer

New Outfits:
- Ash: Ashy Slashy
- Amanda: Duty Calls
- Pablo: El Brujo Especial

name: Underworld Unfinished Business 1: Recruiting Demon Smalls
description:
This is a sequel to The Lizard King. This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2005.

name: Hentai World: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Hook
description: Dead Hook is an explosive mix of roguelike and shooter genre with brutal combat and captivating storytelling. Explore the elder planet Resaract and take on the role of Adam Stone, a mercenary, smuggler, thief, and devoted husband.

name: Atlas Fallen: Limited Edition
description: Pre-order Atlas Fallen:\ Limited Edition now to get the game's official Steelbook, a metal poster, the game on the platform of your choice and the Ruin Rising Pack DLC!

name: Coda
description: Sidescroller for Playdate Console with Rhythm-based Puzzles

name: Fava Beans
description: Fava Beans is a Doom episode replacement mod of nine levels, created by Sean Birkel, with one level from Ben Gates

name: The Sky May Be
description: The Sky May Be is a semi-serious joke WAD for Doom.

name: Doomworld Forum Adventures!
description: It's a small, underdetailed map about the dream of a newbie. Work your way up the ladder to become ruler of Doomworld! It's a DOOM map centered around comedy, just in case you're a bit slow.

name: ZDoom Adventures!
description: The sequel of Doomworld Forum Adventures

name: Doomworld Forums 3
description: This WAD tells the true story of what REALLY happened in the recent episode at the NewDooM forums. My sources are infallible, so don't even try to dismiss any of this as false, because it is the cold, hard truth and it will hit you like a speeding bus in the middle of a rainy night. It's that powerful.

name: Deathloop: Deluxe Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Underworld Unfinished Business 2: Ghost Train at Castle Orr
description:
The third entry in The Lizard King series. This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2005.

name: Nyanpaya
description:
It's a 3-match puzzle game that can be played by up to 8 people!

If you align 3 or more pieces with the same pattern, the pieces will disappear and you will get points!

Score up by erasing while disappearing! Aim for a high score and erase them within the time limit!

name: Iron Armor Storm
description: Iron Armor Storm "is a 3D strategy game based on the theme of World War II Tank War, with the collection of various legendary tanks and tank strategy combinations as the core gameplay, and community-based, camp based cooperation and competition as auxiliary means.

name: Little White Man vs. X
description: Attention: Attention, attention, attention!!! Sometimes the game automatically locks enemies, press the tab key to unlock it. (At the beginning, pressing tab is to lock the enemy) Other operations are in the legal terms

name: Maze Tanks
description: Control the tank to search the maze for your enemies. Obstacles block the field of view, which you can use to hide, or destroy to create a better view and direction of fire. While firing a cannon can also give away your position, it can also be used properly as bait to attract a target.

name: Z World
description: Supernatural aerial combat open world action adventurer. Defend the city against monstrous invasions. This game features interactive NPCs, levitation powers, and avatar choices. Explore.

name: Under the Stars
description: Battle Survival Game,Explore maps and defeat enemies.Use mouse and keyboard to control the game.There is a loading time when the game starts.

name: Unibat
description: Real-time strategy Unibat is a game where you build your own kingdom and manage them, train knights and fight against enemy camps of orcs.

name: VR travel as a little tiny small dwarf
description: This is a leisure game based on 3D VR technology. Players can take small roller coasters to visit different scenes.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Marseille
description: Marseille XP includes a custom replica of the LFML Marseille airport, extensively created to provide an authentic flight experience. In collaboration with ShortFinalDesign, FSS AG has brought another important airport to the X-Plane world.

name: Whimre
description: whimRE is an atmospheric open-world adventure. Complete missions to escape through a portal while surviving against hostile enemies with limited resources using various weapons or stealth tactics. Choose from 3 sets, each with unique advantages. Strategize, fight, and find your way off the island!

name: White Blade
description: Strategic turn-based combat, utilizing various complementary skills to deal with enemy attack patterns.

name: Slayer
description: Step into the unforgiving world of Slayer. Fight your chances with or without friends in a chaotic attempt for survival. Discover new ways to better your odds against new foes, and uncover the truth behind this anarchy. Do you accept the challenge? How long will you survive...

name: Sky is Arrows: Dragon Bracer Item Chest
description: The Sky Is Arrows - Dragon Bracer Item Chest DLC unlocks 6 completely new, unique, and groundbreaking items. The player can use these items to enhance their current playstyle or create new strategies. It's up to the player to determine which items are the best from the random options given.

name: Time Raiders
description: Delve deep and explore the vast eastern undergrounds. Treasures? Monsters? Who knows what awaits you...

name: Arcana: Heat and Cold. Stories
description: The events surrounding the unskilled magician are heating up! Could an unusual way of curing the Arcane Fever have caused such a stir?! Or have we accidentally become involved in a story whose scale we cannot yet comprehend!? Comedy, hentai scenes, and new hilarious adventures await you.

name: Butterfly//Circuit
description: Glimmers of hope are hard to come by, so what happens when the one you have is suddenly snuffed out? In the dark recesses of the city, just out of sight, silhouettes come in to view and connections start to form. Butterfly//Circuit is a cyberpunk thriller kinetic visual novel.

name: BlueSuburbia
description: BlueSuburbia is a haunted world where you explore poems through immersive environments. Seek out dark secrets, confront your demons, and delve deeper into a dream that dances between beautiful and terrible. Explore forgotten dreamscapes and open worlds on your quest to find hope.

name: CityDriver: Alvarez-Lentz Marathon 420 CTI
description: Expand your vehicle fleet by the first ever Van in the history of CityDriver: The Alvarez-Lentz Marathon 420 CTI!

name: CityDriver: Ferdinand Habanero Turbo
description: Expand your vehicle fleet with a Ferdinand Habanero Turbo, a sleek SUV whose name says it all!

name: City Legends: The Ghost of Misty Hill - DLC
description: The doors of medical institutions often hide terrible secrets and outrageous accidents. Don't let ghosts get in the way between you and your search for answers!

name: Coloring Pixels: Pirates Pack
description: This Pirates-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Iconic ships, clothing and everything pirate-y! (Swash)Buckle up and get ready to find some hidden treasure!

name: Combat Mission: Red Thunder - Battle Pack 1
description: Combat Mission Red Thunder Battle Pack 1 is set in or around the time frame of the Soviet assaults through the late summer of '44 in eastern Poland. The Battle Pack includes two new campaigns and 13 standalone scenarios and 13 new Master Maps.

name: Cozy Cabin: Coffee Boutique
description: Cozy Cabin is a first-person coffee making game set in a scenic mountain hideaway. Players run a coffee shop and play mini-games to progress an endearing narrative. Physics-based coffee making, unique characters, lively music, and an enchanting atmosphere make Cozy Cabin the game for you! Order up!

name: Cricket Captain 2023
description: Create your own cricket management legacy with Cricket Captain 2023. A new adaptive aggression system, designed for the modern game, puts you in control. Enhanced statistics include historical international player rankings (including all-rounders), real-world form data, and wicket keeper statistics.

name: Cyber Dose
description: Part puzzler, part farm-sim, part cyberpunk, part serious game. You are an AI databot in a new neural network in the HeXR Cloud. Gather data on digital twins of illicit drugs beamed in by AI health bots. Build your neural network. Stay BOOSTED while completing tasks or you could end up in bot rehab.
